GK16ruyalscu:0: śrīmadvidyācakravartiviracitā sañjīvanyākhyā vyākhyā viśvaṃ prakāśayati yā jātiguṇādyātmakaiḥ nijaiḥ prasaraiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:8: kiṃ vistareṇa bahunā ṭīkāṃ sañjīvanīmimāṃ kaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:10: tatra tāvadadhikṛteṣṭadevatānamaskāra puraskāreṇa prakaraṇapratipādyamarthaṃ pratijānīte namaskṛtya paramiti /
GK16ruyalscu:11: sarvaiva khalviyaṃ vāk parā paśyantī madhyamā vaikharīti caturbhiḥ padaiḥ parimīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:27: tṛtīyā nābhyantarī na ca bāhyeti kṛtvā madhyamā /
GK16ruyalscu:30: tadviśiṣya rāti dadātīti vikharo dehendriyasaṅghātaḥ tatra bhavā vaikharīti” jñeyam /
GK16ruyalscu:34: parādibhiścaturbhiḥ padaiḥ krīḍantīṃ nāmapūrvakatvāt sarvasyaiva rūpasya jagadetadvijigīṣamāṇāṃ
GK16ruyalscu:38: namaskāro hi nāma pṛthagahaṅkāraparityāgena namaskartavyamahimodghāṭanaṃ sāmarasyamiti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:44: itthamimāṃ vācaṃ namaskṛtya nijānāṃ svenaiva praṇītānām alaṅkārasūtrāṇāṃ tātparyamucyate /
GK16ruyalscu:48: atha dhvanidarśanānusāreṇa prakāraṇaṃ praṇinīṣuḥ bhāmahodbhaṭādīnāṃ darśanasthitiṃ pūrvapakṣatveno panyasyati-iha hi tāvadbhāmahodbhaṭetyādinā
GK16ruyalscu:53: yathā- bhama dhaṃmia vīsattho so suṇāo ajja mārio deṇa /
GK16ruyalscu:54: golāṇai kaccha kuḍaṅga vāsiṇā daria sīheṇa //
GK16ruyalscu:59: itthaṃ vācyavilakṣiṇaḥ pratīyamāno yor'thaḥ sa yathāyogaṃ rasavastvalaṅkārasvarūpeṇa
GK16ruyalscu:60: triskandhaḥ san sacamatkāratvāt kavisaṃrambha gocaratvāt sahṛdayapratīti viśrāntiviṣayatvāñca kāvyātmā /
GK16ruyalscu:69: paryāyoktamaprastutapraśaṃsā samāsokti rākṣepaḥ vyājastutirupameyopamā ananvayaḥ ityādiṣu vastumātrameva pratīyate na tu rasālaṅkārau /
GK16ruyalscu:76: atra hayagrīvasya svargavijayaḥ sainikasāvaghajñapārijātamañjarī sparśalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:78: yadvakṣyati - “aprastutātsāmānyaviśeṣabhāve kāryakāraṇabhāve sārūpye ca prastutapratītāvaprastutapraśaṃsā” iti /
GK16ruyalscu:79: yathā- taṇṇātthiṃ kiṃpi pahaṇo pakappiyaṃ jaṃ ṇa ṇiai gharaṇīe /
GK16ruyalscu:84: atra anavaratagamanaśīlasya patyurnijagṛhiṇyā pātheyatvena yanna kalpitaṃ tadyathā nāsti,
GK16ruyalscu:85: tathā kālapathikasya pāthematvena yadakalpitaṃ tannāstītyatra kālaḥsava grasatīti sāmānyarūpādaprastutāt prastuto viśeṣātmā prahastavadhaḥ pratyāyyate
GK16ruyalscu:88: yathā- upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham /
GK16ruyalscu:89: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣyitam //
GK16ruyalscu:91: uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya vā prākāraṇikasya viśeṣapratītyartham ābhāsato niṣedhanamākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:92: yadvakṣyati uktavakṣyamāṇayoḥ prākaraṇikayorviśeṣapratītyarthaṃ niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepaḥ iti /
GK16ruyalscu:94: ṇāhaṃ dūri tīe piosit ti ṇāmhavāvāro /
GK16ruyalscu:95: sā marai tujbhpha ayaso eaṃ dhaṃmakkharaṃ bhaṇimo //
GK16ruyalscu:98: iti cchrāyā '] atra 'nāhaṃ dītiti' dītitvaniṣedho viśiṣṭāsmi dūtītyavagamayati /
GK16ruyalscu:101: yathā - he helājitabodhisattva vacasāṃ kiṃ vistaraistoyadhe/
GK16ruyalscu:107: yathā-'khamiva jalaṃ jalamiva khaṃ haṃsaśvandra iva haṃsa iva candraḥ' /
GK16ruyalscu:114: eṣu paryāyoktāduṣu yadetadvastumātraṃ pratīyate svargavijayādikaṃ rasālaṅkāraparihāreṇa
GK16ruyalscu:115: tadidaṃ sarvairapi pramāṇairātmatvenā vabhāsamānameva sadgaja nimīlikayā vācyāpaskārakatvena
GK16ruyalscu:119: “svasiddhaye parākṣepaḥ parārthaṃ svasamarpaṇam” iti dvividhayā bhaṅgyā /
GK16ruyalscu:125: tatrājahastvārthāyāṃ kuntānāṃ svataḥ praveśāsaṃbhave kauntikān ākṣipya praveśasaṃbhavaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:131: itthaṃ ca satispṛṣṭāstā nandana' iti paryāyoktodāharaṇe sainikānāṃ sāvajñapārijātamañjarīsparśaḥ svargavijayamanākṣipya na saṃbhavatīti kuntādinayena svasiddhaye parākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:143: tathā hi- yasya vikāraḥ prabhavannapratibandhena hetunā yena /
GK16ruyalscu:144: gamayati tadabhiprāyaṃ tatprati bandhaṃ ca bhāvo 'sau //
GK16ruyalscu:148: yato bhāvāsaṅkārasya sandhiśabalatādi lakṣaṇā api bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:149: vakṣyati hi - bhāvodaya sandhiśabalatāśca pṛthagalaṅkārā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:155: upamālaṅkārasya vācyaśobhā hetutvādupanyagbhāvanena utthāpitasya prādhanyena teṣvavasthānāt /
GK16ruyalscu:171: itthaṃ kāvyajīvitāṃśavicāravimukhānām alaṅkāramātrarasikatvāt uttānadṛśāṃ matam upanyasya,
GK16ruyalscu:174: sādṛśyanibandhanāyā iti vadatā sādṛśyaṃ saṃbandha-nibandhanā śabdavṛttirgauṇīti vadanto dūṣyatvena kaṭākṣitāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:176: sādṛśyanibandhanā lakṣaṇā vakroktyalaṅkāra “iti prathayatā kaścit dhvanibhedo lakṣaṇāmūlo
GK16ruyalscu:178: yasttvaṃśo 'laṅkāryo na bhavati so 'pyalaṅkāryatvena kathita ityāha-kevalaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭeti /
GK16ruyalscu:180: rasālaṅkāra nirapekṣairmādhuryādi bhirguṇairviśiṣṭā yeyaṃ saṃghaṭanādharmabhūtā vaidarbhyādi rūpiṇī rītiḥ saiva kāvyātmetyuktā /
GK16ruyalscu:181: tathā ca sūtritaṃ tena - “rītiḥ ātmā kāvyasya“iti /
GK16ruyalscu:182: prakhyāpitaṃ ca - aviditaguṇāpi satkavibhaṇitiḥ karṇoṣu vamati madhudhārām /
GK16ruyalscu:189: śabdālaṅkārebhyoṣa'pi yo bāhyo varṇālaṅkāro 'nuprāsastatsamakakṣyakā etā rītayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:191: etadabhisandhāya vṛttyanuprāsavarṇālaṅkāraprastāve vaidarbhyādayo rītayo vivecitāḥ kāvyaprakāśa kṛdādibhiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:207: tathāhi-aṅgino rasasya dharmā guṇāḥ aṅgayoḥ śabdārthayostvalaṅkārāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:216: itthaṃ ca sati alaṅkārāpekṣayā guṇeṣveva prakṛṣṭaḥ kāvyopaskāraḥ yadvadasphuṭaṭālaṅkāratve 'pi kāvyatvābhyupagamaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:224: anyo 'pi sārabhūtaḥ sūkṣmoṃ'śaḥ tena avadhārita ityabhiprāyeṇāha-vyāpāraprādhānyaṃ ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:229: yaśca vastvalaṅkārarasarūpaḥ trividhaḥ pratīyamānor'thaḥ yatra vidyamāno 'pi tatpratyāyanalakṣaṇasya' vyāpārasyaiva prādhānyamasya matamityāha-satyapi cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:230: upacāro lakṣaṇāśrayaṇāṃ tadvakrateti avivakṣitavācyādi samastadhvaniḥ kaṭākṣitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:231: itthaṃ ca sati dhvanidarśanā detad darśanasyālpakobheda ityāha-'kevalamuktivaicitryeti' /
GK16ruyalscu:235: idṛśasya vyañjanavyāpārasya kāvyātmatvaṃ kathayatā nyagbhāvitaśabdārtha svarūpo 'yaṃ vyāpārastasyaiva prādhānyamuktam /
GK16ruyalscu:236: sa ca vyāpāro laukiko na bhavatītyāha-tatrāpyabhidhābhāvaka tvetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:240: etadvyāpāradvaradvayot tīrṇaḥ sādhāraṇīkṛteṣu vibhāvādiṣu rasacarvaṇātmāṃ bhogāparanāmadheyo vyāpāro viśrāntisthānatayā prādhanyenāṅgīkṛtaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:249: dhvananaṃ dyotanaṃ pratyāyanaṃ vyañjanamityādiprasiddhaparyāyasahatastrasyāvaśyābhyupagamyatvāt tadanabhyupagame vyaṅgyārthapratītau na gatyantaraṃ
GK16ruyalscu:251: nanu vyañjanāvyāpāraḥ pradhānaṃ kiṃ na bhavati,
GK16ruyalscu:254: sarvā eva khalu padārthaśaktayaḥ kāryādipratītyanyathānupapattyā abhyūhyanta eva /
GK16ruyalscu:256: yaśca hetuḥ prādhānye so 'pi vyaṅgya evopapadyate,
GK16ruyalscu:263: yathāsvarūpopalambho viṣayamukhena tathā prādhānyaṃ vicārakṣamatvamapi tanmukhenaivetyāha-tatprādhānyena prādhānyāt /
GK16ruyalscu:265: viṣaya eva tu puṣkalaṃ vākyārthaṃ bhāvamarhatītyāha-viṣayasyaiveti /
GK16ruyalscu:266: sākṣātsvarūpa pratilaṃbhaḥ svataḥ prādhānyaṃ svalarūpeṇa vicāryatvaṃ cetyādi samagre bharaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:269: samagrabhara sahiṣṇutvāt sa niravaśeṣavaibhavamarhatītyata āha-yasya guṇālaṅkāretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:270: nanu rasādayo rasavadādyālaṅkārā eva prācāṃ matāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:272: tatra hetuḥ - alaṅkārāṇāmupaskārakatvāt rasādīnāṃ ca prādhānyenopaskāryatvācca iti /
GK16ruyalscu:276: atoḥ vyaṅgyārtha eva kāvyātmeti nigamayati - tasmād vyaṅgya evetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:286: sarvaireva khalvebhiḥ na śakyate hi vyañjanavyāpāro 'pahnotum /
GK16ruyalscu:287: yadi nāpahnutaḥ kiṃ tata ityata āha-tadāśrayaṇe cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:289: yattu tatra vyaktivivekakāraḥ pratyavasthaitaḥ tadupanyasyati - yattu vyaktivivekakāraḥ ityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:294: anayorniyatasambandhayoḥ yadyanyataro na syāt tadā vyabhicārānna saṃbhavati liṅgaliṅgibhāva iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:299: citrakāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ tu nātyupayujyate ityāśayena nigamayiti-tadetat kuśāgrīyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:304: yadyasti kiṃ tata ityata āha-tatra vyaṅgyasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:308: sa cābhidhāmūlatayā lakṣaṇāmūlatayā ca prathate ityāha-tasya lakṣaṇābhidhāmūlatveneti /
GK16ruyalscu:309: lakṣaṇāmūlatve sati avivakṣita vācyākhyaḥ mukhyārthabādhaśālinyāṃ lakṣaṇāyāṃ vācyāṃśasyāvivakṣitatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:312: vyaṅgyāṅgatvena vivakṣaṇāt anyaparatā ceti vivakṣitānyaparatvam abhidhāmūlasya /
GK16ruyalscu:317: yathā - prārambhe śrutisundaraṃ pariṇātau pathyaṃ janaiḥsugrahaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:319: āhlādāya na kasya nāma viduṣāṃ vaktrāmbujādudgataṃ cittāntarvikasadviveka mukulāmodānubiddhaṃ vacaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:322: atha yadā jahatsvārthatayā parārthaṃ svasamarpaṇaṃ tadātyantatiraskṛtavācyākhyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:323: yathā - eke mūkavadāsate jaḍadhiyo jihneti tatsannidhā vanye durviciktsitaṃ vidadhate tebhyo 'pi bībhatsate /
GK16ruyalscu:324: asthāne bahudhā stuvanti katicittairulkayā dahyate vidyā viklavate kayā na vidhayā prāpyāntikaṃ duṣprabhoḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:325: atra vidyāyāṃ hlībībhatsādiḥ gaṅgādau ghoṣādhikaraṇatādīva sarvathā svasaṃyogino svārthaṃ parityajya na saṃbhavatītyatyanta tiraskṛtavācyatā
GK16ruyalscu:330: tatra kvicid vyaṅgya kramo na saṃlakṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:333: athānayoḥ sakṣaṇābhidhāmūladhvanyorvastvalaṅkāra rasarūpatā viṣayaviśeṣaṃ vyavasthāpayitumāha-lakṣaṇāmūla ityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:334: yo hi lakṣaṇāmūlaḥ sa niyameva śabdaśaktimūlo vasturūpaśca bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:335: yadvi yāvadasti jātiguṇākriyādyātmākaṃ padārthajātaṃ sarvamevaitadvastu kathyate /
GK16ruyalscu:338: atha vivakṣitānyaparavācyo yo 'yaṃ asaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ sa niyamenārthaśaktimūla ubhayaśaktimūlaśca bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:340: tatra yadā rasabhāvarasābhāsa bhāvābhāsabhāvodayabhāvaśānti bhāvasandhibhāvaśabalatā vyajyante,
GK16ruyalscu:341: tadā kramo na saṃlakṣyata iti asaṃlakṣyakramatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:342: tatra raseṣu śṛṅgāraḥsaṃbhogātmā yathā- puṣpodbhedamavāpya keliśayanāddarasthayā cumbane kāntena sphuritādhareṇa nibhṛtaṃ bhrūsaṃjñayā yācite
GK16ruyalscu:343: ācchādya smitapūrṇā gaṇḍaphalakaṃ celāñcalenānanaṃ mandāndolitakuṇḍalastabakayā tanvyā vidhūtaṃ śiraḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:344: atra nāyikānāyakavṛttāntalakṣaṇo yo vācyor'thaḥ yā ca sahṛdayapratīteḥ vedyāntaravigalanena varṇyavastutanmayībhāvalakṣaṇā rasasaṃvit,
GK16ruyalscu:347: vipralambhaśṛṅgāro yathā - nāntaḥ praveśamaruṇādvimukhī na cāsī dācaṣṭaroṣa paruṣāṇi na cākṣarāṇi /
GK16ruyalscu:348: sā kevalaṃ saralapakṣmabhirakṣipātaiḥ kāntaṃ vilokitavatī jananirviśeṣam //
GK16ruyalscu:350: hāsyo yathā - paimaraṇāmaṇḍaṇājjalavesā pāsaṃga esu taruṇesu /
GK16ruyalscu:351: ṇiddhasaraṃ parugrantī savibbhamaṃ haṇā i thaṇāvaṭṭham //
GK16ruyalscu:352: atra patimaraṇāmaṇḍanojjvalaveṣāyāḥ taruṇeṣu pārśvamupagateṣu satsu sadyaḥ snigdhasvaraṃprarudatyāḥ
GK16ruyalscu:354: karuṇasya yathā - sāhityalakṣaṇakale samupaiṣi navya vaidhavyamadya virate guruviṣṇudeve /
GK16ruyalscu:356: raudranya yathā - dṛpyatsūkara kālakaṇṭha śakalavyākīrṇa dhārāntarā krodhottālalulāyakaṇṭhanalakacchedārdhavaktrānanāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:357: śrīballāla vidhāya keli mṛgayāmāvartamānasya te śārdūlendravasābhiṣekasamaye jīyāsurugrāḥśarāḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:358: vīrasya yathā - ādhāturbhuvanaṃ tadetadakhilaṃ cakṣuṣmadākīṭakā-d divyaṃ cakṣurananyalabhya mubhayatrāste paraṃ duḥsaham /
GK16ruyalscu:359: phāle bhūtapatermanobhavamukha kṣudra kṣayojjāgaraṃ bāṇe ca pratirājadarpadalanaṃ ballāla pṛthvīpateḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:360: bhayānakasya yathā - girikuñjeṣu gūḍhānāṃ tavāri varayoṣitām /
GK16ruyalscu:362: bībhatsasya yathā - svātmānandaṃ kimapi paramaṃ sādhu saṃbhuñjate ye teṣāmasyāṃ viṣayavitatau jāyate heyabuddhiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:363: anyeṣāṃ tu prasaratitarāṃ pratyutāsvādanecchā chardiklinne kaphakaluṣite makṣikāṇāmivānne //
GK16ruyalscu:364: adbhutasya yathā - ākarṇitottamaguṇānuguṇeti kṛtvā yāmullilekha sucireṇa mano madīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:365: tāmākṛtiṃ visadṛśīmatimātramasyā dāsye 'pi nāsmi viniveśayituṃ vidagdhaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:366: atra sucira madṛṣṭacaranāyikārūpasyānuguṇa śravaṇānurāgiṇo nāyakasya nāyikāprathamadarśane ākarṇitottama guṇānuguṇatayā manasā samullikhitacarī yā nāyikāmūrtiḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:367: sā samprati sāśrātkṛtanāyikāmūrteratimātraṃ visadṛśī satī dāsītvenāpi niveśayituṃ na śakyata ityuktirābhirūpyanibandhanasya parāṃ kāṣṭhāmāviṣkaroti
GK16ruyalscu:368: śāntasya yathā - mā bhaiṣīḥ kula mā vyathasva vinaya kleśo 'stu mā te śruta pradhvaṃsāya yatasva mā khalu mate māhātmya mā mā tyaja /
GK16ruyalscu:369: yuṣmadrauravasāradāraṇāparānmatvā tṛṇāya prabhūn bhikṣāparyaṭanārjitena kalaye piṇḍena piṇḍasthitim //
GK16ruyalscu:371: atha bhāvadhvaniḥ-bhāvo hi nāma nāyikāvyatirikte devatāgurunṛpaputrādau vyajyamānā ratirvākyārthatvena vyajyamānā nirvedādayo vyabhicāriṇāśca
GK16ruyalscu:372: yathā- adya svapnamupāgatena yamunātīre mayāvasthitaṃ dṛṣṭastatra ca veṇuvādanipuṇo bālo gavāṃ pālakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:373: taṃ dṛṣṭvā karaṇairananyaviṣayairantarvilīno 'bhavaṃ yāvattāvadahaṃ cirādupacitaiḥ pāpaiḥ prabodhaṃ gataḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:374: yathā ca - saṃsārārtyā vidhuravidhuro brahma yatnādvicinvan nānārūpaṃ jagadidamahaṃ dṛṣṭavāneva pūrvam /
GK16ruyalscu:375: haste nyaste sati tava guro sāṃprataṃ mastake 'smim brahmaivaitatsakalamabhavanno jagannāpi cāham //
GK16ruyalscu:376: yathā ca - kāṣṭhāprātpiriyaṃ parā khalu parīpākasya bhāgyonnateḥ śrī ballāla nṛpāla/
GK16ruyalscu:378: yastiṣṭhetpratihāra sīmni bhavato ruddhapraveśaściraṃ kiṃ nāsāvapi colapāṇḍyapṛthvīpālaiḥsamaṃ gaṇyate //
GK16ruyalscu:387: bhāvābhāso yathā - kvaṇādūdvirephāvalinīlaṅkaṇāṃ prasāryaṃ śākhābhujamāmra vallarī /
GK16ruyalscu:395: bhāvasandhiryathā - netre jihyakharāruṇe kṣaṇāmatha vyāmīlyamānekṣaṇāṃ hastaṃ vyagragamāganaṃ kṣaṇāmatho dante śayānaṃ kṣaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:396: sañcāraṃ viṣamākulaṃ kṣaṇamatha prakrāntalīlaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dhatte totriṣu ṣaṭpadeṣu ca samaṃ dattāvadhāno gajaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:397: atra gajasya madākulasya yadetatkṣaṇamātraṃ netrayoḥ jihyākharā ruṇāyoḥ dharaṇāṃ samanantarameva yaccaitadūvyāmīlanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:398: tathā haste ca yatkṣaṇāmatraṃ vyagro gamāgamaḥ yacca samanantarameva dante śayanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:401: tadetat vividhaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ viceṣṭitadvayaṃ udbhavābhibhavadharmitayā kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇāmāvirbhavat
GK16ruyalscu:402: totriviṣayaṃ roṣaṃ ṣaṭpadaśabdalakṣitaṣaṭpadagītaviṣayaṃ harṣa ca parasparasyādattā
GK16ruyalscu:404: dvandva vṛttiṣu ca triṣvapi vākyeṣu pratisvaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇamityupādānādyathā yathā
GK16ruyalscu:408: dhatta iti vartamānanirdeśena prārabdhāparisamātpabhāvādekatarasyāṃ koṭāvaniṣṭheti dyotyate /
GK16ruyalscu:410: totriṣuṣaṭpadeṣu ca tulitamavadhānadānaṃ tadapyeka tarasyāṃ koṭā vaniṣṭāmeva vyanakti /
GK16ruyalscu:412: bhāvaśabalatā yathā - madhyesakhījanamupahvaravṛttajātaṃ vācā prakāśayati mayyupadeśavṛttyā /
GK16ruyalscu:413: sāsūyasapraṇāyasatrapa saprasādaiḥ sā māṃ vilokitavatī caṭulaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:416: bhāvaśāntiryathā tau saṃmukhapracalitau savidhe guruṇāṃ mārgapradānarabhasaskhalitāvadhānau /
GK16ruyalscu:421: atha saṃlakṣyakrame śabdaśaktimūlo 'laṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśca niyamena bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:422: tatrālaṅkārarūpo yathā - prāpyādharadvayadhurāṃ paricumbatīva līlottaraṃ vilikhatīva nakhatvametya /
GK16ruyalscu:423: tasyāḥ kaṭākṣavalanaṃ gurusannidhau māmāśrliṣyatīva samavāpya ca bāhubhāvam //
GK16ruyalscu:424: atrotprekṣālaṅkāreṇa cumbanādikāraṇā bhāve 'pi saṃbhogasukhā vātpilakṣaṇākāryotpattirūpā vibhāvanā vyajyate /
GK16ruyalscu:427: saṃsparśaṃ ca na tasya vetyupacitastambhaṃ mamaitadvapuḥ saṃvṛttaḥsakhi saṅgamo 'pi virahaprāyo vidhātāsmi kim //
GK16ruyalscu:428: atra vastuni avastutvabhramāt maugdhyalakṣaṇaṃ vastu pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:430: sa cālaṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśceti pratyekaṃ dvaividhye ṣoḍhā /
GK16ruyalscu:432: tathā hi - svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā vastu svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā alaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:436: tenālaṅkāraḥ kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena alaṅkāreṇa vastu tena alaṅkāraḥ ityapi caturdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:438: atra prapañcaḥ saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭokāyāṃ asmābhiḥ vitatyopa darśita iti tato 'vadhāryaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:439: iha tu granthagauravabhayāt prastāvānupayogācca na pratanyate /
GK16ruyalscu:440: diṅmātrantūdāhliyate- tatra svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā vastu yathā - adyāpi loke na kavirna so 'sti prācāṃ tulāṃ yaḥ prabalo 'dhiroḍhum /
GK16ruyalscu:441: purātano nāyamitīya deva tathāpi nindā yadi kiṃ karotu //
GK16ruyalscu:442: atra svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā aham evaṃvidha iti vaktuḥ svamāhātmyaprakhyāpanalakṣaghaṇaṃ vastu pratyāyyate //
GK16ruyalscu:443: kavinibaddhenālaṅkāreṇa vastu yathā - dṛṣṭirniṣṭhura baddhasārakhadirāṅgāra sphuliṅgopamā jihve sajjanatarjanolbaṇābalatkālāṅgulīcañcale /
GK16ruyalscu:445: kūrānukāraḥsakhe jaṅghe dve yadi tebhujaṅgabhuvanaṃ valmīkaśeṣaṃ bhavet //
GK16ruyalscu:446: atra kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena aprastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāreṇa vidhivihitamanāryāṇāṃ kvicidaṃśe daurbalyaṃ viśvamabhirakṣatīti vastu /
GK16ruyalscu:452: kavinibaddhāyāḥ svairiṇyāḥ prauḍhoktiniṣpāditena rūpakālaṅkāreṇa upagūhanādinivāraṇāśālibhyo 'sya bāndhavamaraṇamahotsavasya atiśayapratyāyanātmā vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:457: sandigdhaprādhānyaṃ tulyaprādhānyaṃ kākkākṣitpa masundaratvam iti vācyāṅgatvādayo bhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:460: tatra vācyāṅgatvaṃ yathā - śūnye tvadripurājadhāmni sudṛśāṃ citrārpitā nāṃ karaṃ saṃllāpaspṛhayā patannapi muhuḥ kīraḥsamārohati /
GK16ruyalscu:463: atra śūnyīkṛtaripurājaveśmā nāyakaprabhāvātiśayaḥ pratīyamāno 'pi śukahaṃsavṛttāntopapādakatvena sthita iti vācyāṅgatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:465: itthaṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyayoḥsvarūpamupodgadhātatvena yathāyogamupanyasya prakaraṇā pratipipādayiṣitaṃ citrākhyaṃ kāvyamadhikīrṣurāha-citraṃ tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:468: ihārthapaunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyaṃ śabdārthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti trayaḥ paunaruktyaprakārāḥ // RuAss_1 //
GK16ruyalscu:469: nanu citramityupakramya paunaruktyaprakārakathane kā saṅgatiḥ ityata āha ādau paunakuktyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:471: kakṣyāvibhāgaṃ ghaṭayituṃ kakṣyāvibhāgasyaiva ca sphuṭīkārāya pratyekaṃ paunaruktyagrahaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:475: nanu śabdapratītipūrvakatvādarthapratīteḥ prathamaṃ arthapaunaruktyanirdeśo na yujyata ityata āha-arthāpekṣayetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:480: nirdiṣṭasya ca paunaruktyatrayasya sampabratipannatāmabhisandhāyāha-śābde prasthāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:482: nanu traya evetisamāptyarthatā kiṃ neṣyata ityata āha-triśabdādevetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:488: na ca mantavyaṃ sati prakāraśabde paunaruktyaṃ prasajediti /
GK16ruyalscu:489: prakāraśabdo hi paunaruktyaprakāramābaha-sa ca paunaruktyaprakāraḥ kena prakāreṇa triprakāra iti jijñāsāyām itiśabdaḥ tatprakāra vacana iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:497: upādeye pratiyegyantare prasṛtāyāḥ pratipattṝ pratīteḥ avyākṣepāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:500: bhāvānayane dravyānayanamiha anusartavyaṃ nirdhārite paunaruktyatraya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:503: yacchravaṇasamanantaraṃ yathāvadavabhātaṃ tattathaiva cetpratītiḥviśrāntyantaṃ nirbādham avatiṣṭheta sa praroha ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:508: nanu lakṣyapade punaruktavadābhāsa iti svarūpaprādhānyena nirdeśo nyāyyaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:509: na tu punaruktavadābhāsamiti kāvyaparatantratayā ityata āha-lakṣyanirdeśa ityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:519: paryavasāneṣu ahīnasya mahato bhujaṅgādhīśasya vapurvalayaṃ kaṅkaṇamasyetyanyathātvam /
GK16ruyalscu:520: itthaṃ śilāderapatyaṃ śailādiḥ śailādeḥ nandina iva caritamasyeti,
GK16ruyalscu:526: tathā śikhī pāvakaśca locane yasyeti ca śikhipāvakalocana iti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:527: tathā sarvamaṅgalāsahitaḥ pārvatīśa iti ca sarvairmaṅgalaismahitaśteti paunaruktyaṃ cāmukhābhāsanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:529: atha vyastatayā samāsāntarāyaśrayatayā ca darśiyitumudāharaṇāntaraṃ-dāruṇa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:532: itthaṃ bhasma ca bhūtiśceti bhasmavano 'bhivṛddiriti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:533: tathā raktaṃ ca śoṇāṃ ceti ca rudhiravacchreṇamiti cāvagantavyamṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:536: kuṇḍalī sarpo bhujaṅgaśca kuṇḍalī ceti bhujaṅgakuṇḍalavāniti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:539: śaṃ śivaḥ śubhraiḥ aṃśubhiḥ śītaṃ cakṣurindriyamiti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:540: haraḥśiva iti ceto hara iti ca yojanīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:542: pāyādavyācceti tu tiṅantāpekṣayā ita ityapāyaviśeṣaṇatvena paryavasāne pañcamyantatayā pāyādavyādityanyathātvam /
GK16ruyalscu:547: atrādyaṃ padamuddeśyaṃ caramaṃ tu dvayaṃ vidheyam /
GK16ruyalscu:550: nanu kevalasvarapaunaruktyasya kiṃ vṛttamityata āha-alaṅkāraprastāva ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:552: tatprastāve kevalasvarapaunaruktyama cārutvāt na gaṇanāmarhatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:562: nanu sāyaṃ kāyamityatra ko 'laṅkāra ityata āha-atra sāyaṃ śabdetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:565: itthaṃ ca sati sāyaṃ śabde dvayorekābhidhānalakṣaṇāḥsaṅkaraḥ abhidhatta ityabhidhānaṃ vācaka śabdaḥ ekavācakānupraveśalakṣaṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:575: śṛṅgārādirasaviṣayo yo 'yaṃ pratiniyamabhājāṃ varṇānāṃ vyañjanavyāpāraḥ sa vṛttirucyate /
GK16ruyalscu:576: so 'yaṃ varṇavyāpāro 'smin varṇāracanātmake kavivyāpāre 'stītyupacāreṇa varṇaracanāvṛttirityāha-tadvatī punarityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:584: yāvatā śabdālaṅkāreṣvapi yo bahiraṅgo vṛttyanuprāsātmā varṇālaṅkāraḥ taddharmatvāt tacchreṣabhūtā etā ityalamaprāsaṅgikavaidaddhya pravacanena
GK16ruyalscu:590: sitāsitaruceḥ uttaralatārakatvāt anavasthitavarṇasanniveśāḥ sācīkṛtāḥ apāṅgānnirgantum ivehamānāḥsālasā rasānuśayaṃ nivartamānāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:592: sākūtā bhavatu paśyāma itīva vyāharantyaḥ sarasāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:593: raso rāge viṣe vīrye tiktādau pārade drave /
GK16ruyalscu:594: roṣāruṇimnā viṣayaṃ viṃliṃpantyaḥ mānānuvidvāḥ dṛṣṭaśrutādyaparādhajanmā roṣomānastena saṃmūrcchitāḥ jvalatkalpā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:598: yadyapi kavervāṇī prabalena śabdāḍambareṇa khelantī prārambhe prathate,
GK16ruyalscu:599: tathāpi satāṃ mānorañjanaṃ na kurute amandaiḥ sundaraiśca guṇālaṅkāraiḥ mukharīkṛtaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:600: saniṣpandaṃ vilasadrasāyana rasā sārānusārī śṛṅgārādiko raso yāvanna syādityatra
GK16ruyalscu:602: bhphaṅkāritetyādāvekadhā samudāyasādṛśyaṃ rasāyana rasetyatra tu raseti samudāyatrayasya parasparasādṛśyamityanusandheyam /
GK16ruyalscu:603: tathā ca “āṭope” tyādau gauḍīyā “amandasundare” tyādau vaidarbhī,
GK16ruyalscu:606: so 'nuprāsaḥsa ca cheka vṛttyu pādhiva śādrūdvidhā //
GK16ruyalscu:617: svaravyañjanātmakasya śabdasamudāyasya yattenaiva rūpeṇa punarvacanaṃ tadyamanādyamakam /
GK16ruyalscu:620: kintu sarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ bhedānāmetadvaicitryatrayam āvahatīti abhiprāyeṇāha-atra kacidbhinnārthetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:625: rucire ramye vanajāyate padmadalavat dīrghe tasyāḥ netre yo yaḥ paśyayati,
GK16ruyalscu:627: idaṃ dvayoḥsārthakatve anarthakatve dvairūpye yathā- tvaṃ rāvaṇa/
GK16ruyalscu:632: itthamarthapaunaruktye punaruktavadābhāsaṃ śabdapaunaruktye tu anuprāsayamakālaṅkārau ca vivecitau /
GK16ruyalscu:639: śabdasyārthasya ca punarvacanamanuvādādatirikte viṣaye doṣaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:647: tadā jāyante guṇāḥ yadā te sahṛdayairgṛhyante /
GK16ruyalscu:649: atra dvitīyayorguṇa kamalaśabdayoḥ ślāghādyā śrayatvaṃ tātparyabhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:659: itthaṃ ca sati padanubandhanatayā prātipadika mātranibandhanatayā ca lāṭānuprāso dvidhā mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:671: yatra tāveva śabdārthau tātparyaṃ tu vibhidyate /
GK16ruyalscu:678: tathopamādayo 'pi sādharmyādivyapāśrayeṇa vargaśo 'vasthāyina ityava bodhitaṃ mantavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:685: paunaruktyaṃ tadātmakasya khaṅgabandhādicitrasya kathanaṃ paunaruktyaprastāve saṅgacchrata ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:688: khaṅgādisanniveśo hi lipyakṣarāṇām eva na śrotrākāśa samavāyināmṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:689: vācakatvaṃ tu śrotrākāśasamavāyināmeva na punarlipi sanniveśinām /
GK16ruyalscu:690: itthaṃ ca sati khaṅgādibandhagatānāṃ yadyapi vācakaśabdālaṅkāratā nopapadyate,
GK16ruyalscu:692: ataḥ sthūlabuddhilālanīyatvāt vācakaśabdabahirbhāvācca nātra kavibhirādaraḥ kārya iti mantavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:696: ato yathāvyutpatti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ ca padmamuraja gomūtrikādibandhānāṃ parigraho 'bhyanujñāyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:708: dalāni dikṣu catvāri catvāri ca vigikṣu,
GK16ruyalscu:710: atha daleṣu dvayaṃ dvayamakṣarāṇāṃ prāgdalāt prādakṣiṇyena pāṭhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:712: atrāyaṃ niṣkarṣaḥ- karṇikāyāṃ likhedekaṃ dvau dikṣu vivikṣu ca /
GK16ruyalscu:721: upamīyate sādharmyaṃ nayatītyupamānam aprākaraṇikor'thaḥ tacca niyamena adhikaguṇameva bhavati guṇādhāvṛtvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:722: upamīyate sādharmyaṃ nīyate ityupameyaṃ prākaraṇikor'thaḥ tacca niyamenādheyaguṇatvāt nyūnaguṇāmevaṃ bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:731: ato merusarṣapādau vivakṣayā parikalpayituṃ śakyo 'pi upamānopameyabhāvo nālaṅkāraviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:733: bhedābhedetyasya vyāvartya darśayituṃ sādharmyaṃ prakārānvivinakti sādharmye yatra ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:739: bhegābhedatulyatva evopamā syāditi yaduktaṃ tatprāmāṇikasaṃvādena draḍhayitumāha-yadāhurityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:745: yadetadasyā uddeśe prāthamyaṃ tatra prayojanaṃ darśayati-upamaiva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:755: candra eva na mukham iti apahnutaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:758: asyāṃ prāvṛṣi mukhaṃ candrabimbañca vicchrāyamityekā tulyayogitā /
GK16ruyalscu:761: mukhameva ramyaṃ candra eva hṛdya iti prativastūpamā /
GK16ruyalscu:767: na mukhena vinā candraḥ samīcīnā itivinīktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:771: mukhe roṣo na doṣāya nahīndo rnindāyai kalaṅkarekhetyarthāntanyāsaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:781: ayaṃ punarācāryaḥ sarvasyaivopamāprapañcasya anyaiḥ anupapāditacara vaicitryatrayamupapādayiṣurāha-tatrāpi sādhāraṇādharmasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:783: mukhaṃ candra iva hṛdyamityekenaiva rūpeṇa hṛdya tvādeḥsādhāraṇadharmasya nirdeśaḥ kriyate ityekaṃ vaicitryam /
GK16ruyalscu:785: ekor'tho vastutvenopameyagataḥ prativastutvena nirdiśyata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:789: “valitakandharamānanamāvṛttavṛntaśatapatranibham” ityādau hi yena saha saṃbadhnāti sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ sa sambandhī,
GK16ruyalscu:790: kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ ekatra kandharā aparatra vṛntaṃ tadbhedopādhinā svayamabhinno 'pi abhedodharmobhedena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:794: abhinna dharmasya bhedena nirdeśe nyāyoyaḥsa ihāpi saṃbhavatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:796: abhinnadharmasya bhedena nirdeśe nyāyoyaḥsa ihāpi saṃbhavatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:797: yadā punaraṃsārpita hāro 'yaṃ sanirjharodgāra ivetyādau sādharmyaṃ dharmidvārakaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:804: yā yāvatī saṃbhavatyupamāpūrṇā lutpā ca saprabhedaprapañcā sā sarvaivāsmadupadarśitena vaicitryatrayeṇa tridhā prathata iti /
GK16ruyalscu:806: prabhāpekṣayā mahatīti kathanāt svāpekṣayā tanvīti vivakṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:808: ubhe hi khalu ete svāpekṣayā tanīyasyau prabhāpekṣayā tu mahatyau /
GK16ruyalscu:815: itthaṃ ca satyanupāttasyāpi sādhāraṇadharmasyānu gāmitayaikarūpyeṇa nirdeśa udāhṛto mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:816: yadvā trimārgayetyetadeva tantreṇa nyāyena devīviśeṣaṇatayāpi saṅgacchrate /
GK16ruyalscu:826: yāntyā upavanātpuraṃ prati kareṇukayā gacchantyāsahacarīsaṃllāpādivyapadeśena vāraṃvāramapavṛttaśirodharā,
GK16ruyalscu:827: ata eva āvṛttavṛntasya kalahaṃsakarṇakaṇḍūyanādinā vivalitabandhanasya kuśeśayasya sadṛśyam ānanam vahantyāḥ kaṭākṣo me hṛdaye nikhātaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:837: atraika eva dharmaḥsambandhibhedena valitāvṛttaśabdābhyāṃ vastuprativastubhāvena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:846: nanu upameyatvamupamānatvaṃ ca kathamekatraiva saṅgacchta ityāha-vācyābhiprāyeṇotyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:847: pūrvaṃ rūpamupameyatvaṃ tadanugamo vācyābhiprāyeṇa yatpunarapūrvaṃ rūpamupamānatvaṃ tadanugamo vyaṅgyābhiprāyeṇeti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:848: nanvekatra viruddhadharmopanibandhalabhyaḥ kor'tha ityata āha-ekasya tu viruddhetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:851: yata itthaṃ sadṛśāntarasyānanvayaḥ ataḥsaṃjñeyamanvarthetyāha-ata evānanvaya ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:871: itthaṃ ca satyupamānopameyabhāvavyatyayo vākyaikavākyatāmantareṇa na saṃbhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:895: iyaṃ yoddhukāmaṃ lavamālokya sakautukasya sūtasya candraketuṃ pratyuktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:899: atra hi pūrvānubhūtārthadarśanādeva smṛtiḥ na tu sadṛśānubhavāt /
GK16ruyalscu:904: kintu mṛgayānivṛttyādikaṃ smartavyasutpiviśeṣaṇamata iṣṭārtho 'pi na bhavatītyabhavanmatayogākhyo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:908: tato 'sya smaraṇālaṅkārasya kiṃ vaidharmyamityata āha-preyo 'saṅkārāsya tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:910: atrābhiniviṣṭasya nāyakasya priyānurāgasaṃskārāṇāṃ saskārāntarābhibhāva katayābhūyobhūyaḥsamuddhudhyamānānāṃ mahimnaiva smṛtiḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:921: iha tu karaṇaṃ nopalabhāmaha ityata āha-karaṇāsyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:922: kṛñbhvastyarthānāṃ sarvadhātvanuyāyitvāt kriyāyāḥsāmānyātmā karotyarthaḥ darśane 'pi saṃbhavata /
GK16ruyalscu:931: nanu smararipudarśanakautukāstamaye prakṛtanāyakadarśanaṃ heturiti kāvyaliṅgaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-matāntara ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:934: smaraṇaṃ tu sarvatra na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:942: candratvādyāropasya yo viṣayo mukhādiḥ tasyānapahnavaśca rūpakālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:945: athāropa śabdārthaṃ vivṛṇvan vyudasanīyaviṣayavivecanapuraskāreṇa viṣayamasya vivecayati-āropo 'nyatrānyeti /
GK16ruyalscu:947: sa ca dviṣṭhatvāt viṣayiṇā viṣayeṇa cāvaṣṭabhyate /
GK16ruyalscu:949: yadā candra eva na mukhamiti viṣayasyāpahnavaḥ tadāpahnutyalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:952: viṣayī viṣayaṃ svena rūpeṇa rūpavantaṃ karotīti rūpakamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:977: samastāni niravaśeṣāṇi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyātmakāni vastūni viṣayo yasya tat samastavastuviṣayam /
GK16ruyalscu:978: yatpunaḥ viśeṣaṇāṃśe kvacinna kriyate viśeṣaṇāṃśāntare viśeṣye ca kriyate tadekadeśa eva viśiṣya vartanādekadeśavivarti /
GK16ruyalscu:980: śliṣṭaśabdam aśliṣṭaśabdaṃ ceti dvairūpyamanuprapadya pratisvaṃ kevalaṃ mālārūpaṃ ceti pratama ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:990: yadā tu viśeṣaṇāṃśa rūpaṇabalādeva viśeṣye rūpakamarthādavagamyate,
GK16ruyalscu:993: evamādibhedāḥ sthūlatayā na pratanyanta iti āha-anyetvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1007: atra grāmyajanoktau samastapadārthaviṣayatvāt samastavastuviṣayaṃ sāvayavaṃ rūpakam /
GK16ruyalscu:1011: atra kīrtīnāṃ haṭhahṛtamahilātvamarthāt pratīyata iti ekadeśa vivarti sāvayavam /
GK16ruyalscu:1012: kṣitibhṛta ityaṃśe tu saṃkaraḥ ityabhiprāyeṇāha-kṣitibhṛta ityatretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1014: atra na hanti kimityādau nāñā prathamato hananādināṣedhaḥ kimiti kākvā nirākriyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1016: atra vaktrenduriti rūpaṇam yasyenduniṣṭhasya pīyūṣasya hetuḥ tadadharāmṛtena saha śliṣṭam /
GK16ruyalscu:1018: ata indurūpaṇadvārā bhātatvāt paraṃparitaṃ kevalaṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:1022: vairiṇāṃ kamalāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ saṅkoca eva kamalānāmasaṅkocaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1025: tadabhāva eva durgāyāḥ kātyāyinyā mārgaṇaṃ tatra nīlalohitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1026: samitaḥ saṃgrāmāḥ tā eva samidha edhāṃsi tatsvīkāre vaiśvānaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1030: dakṣaḥ dakṣaprajāpatiḥ vijaye prāgbhāvo 'gresaratā sa eva vijayādarjunātprāgbhāvaḥ purojanma tatra bhīma/
GK16ruyalscu:1033: atra viduṣāṃ mānasetvaṃ haṃsa iti pratītau kathamasya haṃsatvamiti vimarśo jāto,
GK16ruyalscu:1035: tathāvagamitena śleṣeṇa haṃsatvameva vyavatiṣṭhata iti śliṣṭaśabda paraṃparitamṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:1040: dakṣabhīmapadayoḥ śleṣa eva pratītiviśrāntaḥ aṃśāntaramihodāharaṇamiti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:1052: nanukṣmāsauvidalla ityatra bhūmeḥ mahiṣyādirūpaṇamaśābdamityata āha-atra kṣmetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1057: na kevalamidaṃ paraṃparitaṃ rūpakam anvayamukhenaiva yāvatā vyatirekamukhenāpi saṃbhavatītyāha-idaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1064: tatra kā gatirityata āha - atra cāropyamāṇasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1079: tairetaiḥ nimittairaṣṭabhiḥ viṣakāryaireva garalarūpor'thaṃ udbhāvyata iti neha viṣaśabdaśleṣo rūpakahetukaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1082: evaṃvidhe viṣaye śleṣa eva na tu rūpakamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1105: tasmādāropyamāṇaṃ candratvādimukhādau prakṛtārthe tādrūpyapratītyādhānarūpeṇa uparañjakatvenaiva rūpakālaṅkāre 'nvayaṃ bhajate /
GK16ruyalscu:1107: pariṇāmālaṅkāre punaḥ āropyamāṇaṃ na kevalaṃ prakṛtoparañjakaṃ yāvatā prakṛtarūpamapahnuvānaṃ sattadātmatvenopayujyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1117: itthaṃ ca sati viṣayitvāropaṇaṃ viṣaye tādrūpyapratītimātraṃ cedvivakṣyate,
GK16ruyalscu:1118: tadā tādrūpyapratīti janakatva mātramu parañjakatvam itye tāvataiva āropaṇasya caritārthatā /
GK16ruyalscu:1123: itarathā rūpakanyāyena prakṛtasya svarūpasthaganena prakṛtameva na pratīyeta /
GK16ruyalscu:1139: na khalvayaṃ kāvye lakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ āgamarūpeṇa vā anumānarūpeṇa vā khyā (ta i)
GK16ruyalscu:1141: tatrāpi sāṅkhyayogādiśāstraviṣayeṇa pratijñātaṃ khalvasmābhiḥ śrīguruprasādasamanantaraṃ śaiśava eva yathā - “śaivaṃ viṣṇunibaddhamaupaniṣadaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ sapātañjalaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:1143: bhūtānāṃ tu vinodanāya bharataṃ nīrti ca vātsyāyanaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:1147: dustārkikajaradgavān pratyāpahālaparasya mamāyamanyaḥ ślokaḥ- sāṅkhyaṃ veśmani veśmani śrutiśiraḥ kakṣyāsu kakṣyāsu ca dvāri dvāri śivāgamāḥ pathi pathi prācāṃ kavīnāṃ giraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1150: mahārāja vīraballālāsthānajuṣāṃ viduṣāṃ prasādāśiṣo hi mayyetāḥ prathante /
GK16ruyalscu:1152: prākṛta pṛthvīśvaraḥ śaurasenī śiromaṇi magidhīmakaradhvajaḥ ṣaiśācīparameśvaro 'pabhraṃśarājahaṃso 'laṅkāracakravartī dhvaniprasthānaparamācāryaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:1158: veśaṣyābhujaṅga ityādyā mahārājahosalarāja kuladvāri praśasti śilāśāsanaprabhṛtibhiḥ vayamupaśāntarabhasāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1162: sā cāyaṃ pariṇāmālaṅkāro dvirūpa iti vyutpādayati-tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1170: atrātarasyā prakṛtasyā na kevalaṃ maitrītādrūpyapratītimātraṃ vivakṣyate,
GK16ruyalscu:1172: ataḥ aprakṛtasya prakṛtarūpāpannasya prakṛtopayoga iti prakṛtasya svarūpādapracyuteḥ pariṇāmatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1175: prakṛtarūpāpannasya prakṛtopayoga iti pariṇāmabījabhūtaṃ upayogitvamuddhāṭayitumāha-bhrātasasya maitrītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1176: yata itthaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayoge pariṇāmālaṅkārasya viṣayavyavasthātasmāt samāsoktisādharmyamastīti vyutpipādayuṣurupakramate-tavatra yathetyādinā
GK16ruyalscu:1178: upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā nasāmukham /
GK16ruyalscu:1179: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam //
GK16ruyalscu:1181: na lakṣita[mi]ti vākyānupreśāntaṃ vivakṣita iti prakṛtopayogī /
GK16ruyalscu:1185: na tu rūpakanyāyena rūpasamāropamātramityaṃśe pariṇāmasamāsoktyoḥ sādharmyamavagantavyamityata āha-evamihāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:1188: nanu yadi dvayoḥ prayogastarhi pariṇāmatvameva kathamityata āha-tādātmyāttviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1189: na khalu tādātmye sati “kṣīraṃ dadhīti” prayogamātrāt pariṇāmatvahāniḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1208: nirjñātameva ṇukhādilakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtamarthaṃ bhittī kṛtya candrādāvaprakṛter'thesandihyamāne sandehasya dviṣṭhatvāt prakṛtor'tho 'pi sandehaḍolāmadhirohati
GK16ruyalscu:1209: itthaṃ prakṛtāprakṛtagatatvena ya utthāpyate pratibhayaiva sandehaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:1210: sa sandeho 'laṅkāraḥ na tu sthāṇupuruṣādāviva svarasavāhī /
GK16ruyalscu:1220: sarvā diśo na prasaratīti ūrdhva jvalanaikasvabhāva rūpatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1222: atrāsaṅkhya turagatvā dinā mārtaṇḍatvadisandehāpagama eva jāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1223: tena punarnāyakasya śṛṅgrāhikayā rūpanirjñānamiti niścayābhāsā ete /
GK16ruyalscu:1227: parato niścitamiti kathanāt dvitīyārdhānte itthaṃ sandihyetyadhyāhāryam /
GK16ruyalscu:1228: kvacitpunarviṣaye saṃśayitavye 'pira āropyamāṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ viṣayāntaratvamapi bhavatīti āha-kvacidityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1233: nanvatra sambhāvanāpi pratīyata iti kathaṃ sandehālaṅkāra ityata āha-kecidadhyavasāyetyādi //
GK16ruyalscu:1251: niṣpatya ālīya sādṛśyāditi yaduktaṃ tatra pratyudājihīrṣurāha-gāḍhamarmetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1258: alaukikatvanayo 'yaṃ sandehe 'pi samāna iti vyutpādayati-evaṃ sthāṇurityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1277: tāmanatikramya rucyādiṣu triṣu yathāyogamekaṃ dvayaṃ trayameva vā prayojakaṃ bhavatītiyāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1280: rurcyarthitvavyutpattyanusāreṇa ekasminnapyanusandhānena sādhite nirdhāriter'the ābhāsaḥ pratītirbhidyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1285: janapade hi tapovanatvādi dharmā nisargata eva santi /
GK16ruyalscu:1289: samastā vyastā iti munyādīnāṃ tapovanā ditvenollekhe tathāvidhā rucyādayo hi samastatayā vyastatayā vā saṃbhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:1293: yatra tvaṃśe rūpakaṃ tatra yadyullekhātmikā vicchittirna saṃbhavati tadā nāstyeva vivādaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1306: na hyanekadhāgrahaṇarūpaṃ vaicitryaṃ bhrāntimānapi svalakṣaṇopapanna ityata āha-saṅkarapravṛttistviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1308: vastuto hitapovanādyavayavāpekṣayā na jana padasyāvayavino bhedo 'sti /
GK16ruyalscu:1309: itthaṃ ca satyabhede bheda ityevaṃ rūpātiśayoktiratrāstu kiṃ manyakalpanenetyākṣepaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1318: nārāyaṇa iti pariṇatavayobhiḥ śrīvallabha iti taruṇībhaiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1320: atra puraḥ praveśāvasare eka eva kṛṣṇo jaratībhiḥ sākṣānmokṣaprado nārāyaṇa itidṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1325: na cātra śaṅkanīyaṃ kautukeneti prayojakāntaropādānānneha rucyādayaḥ prayojakā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:1328: vacasi viṣayabhūte guruḥ prāmāṇikatvāt anullaṅghyo vācaspatiśca /
GK16ruyalscu:1331: ityādau hyeka eva upavarṇyo nāyako vacaḥ-pramukharviṣayabhedādgrahītṛbhedanairapekṣyeṇa rucyādivaśāt anekadhā gṛhyata ityullekhālaṅkāratvam
GK16ruyalscu:1335: ato lakṣaṇopapannam alaṅkārāntaraṃ sati śleṣe na syāditi nātrollekho yukta ityākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1339: athāpi svarūpeṇa avidyamānasya bādhāsaṃbhavāt bādha evollekhasadbhāve liṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:1341: yata itthamato na tu sarvathā tadabhāva ityalaṅkārāntarameva /
GK16ruyalscu:1342: etadeva sādhayitum atraivodāharaṇe śleṣanairapekṣyaṃ darśayati-yadevaṃvidha ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1345: nirmalo yaśasi” iti śleṣābhāve 'pi na ullekhābhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1346: yasmāditthaṃ tasmādevamādau viṣaye ullekhālaṅkāra eva viśeṣavicchittika iti alaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā śreyān praśasyatara ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1360: yadyapi śleṣato bādho na tathāpyasya nihnavaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1364: nanu mukhaṃ na bhavatīti viṣayāpahnavamātre satyapi nāpahnutirityato 'dhikāraṃ smārayati-vastvantarapratītirityeveti /
GK16ruyalscu:1366: tathāhi kāvyaprakāśakṛt- “prakṛtaṃ yanniṣidhyānyat sādhyate sā tvapahnutiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1367: ” nanu yadi sādṛśyādvastvantarapratītirihāpi ko viśeṣaḥ tarhyasya bhrāntimata ityata āha-prakāntānapahvavetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1371: ullekhe tu na prakṛtānapahnavamātraṃ viśeṣaḥ kintu anekadhāgrahaṇamapi jñeyam /
GK16ruyalscu:1382: tarhi tṛtīyabhede ko vicchrittiviśeṣaḥ ityata āha-pūrvaka ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1384: no māṃ prati tatheti prakṛtāpahnavaḥ uttarārdhe 'prakṛtasādhanamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1385: yadyapi apahnutireṣā tathāpi doṣānuviddhatvāt udāharaṇābhāsa ityata āha-atraindavasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1387: apahnotumiṣyasya śaśakasya yaḥ prativastubhūta ulkāpātakiṇaḥ tasyaivāropo nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1389: itthaṃ lakṣaṇopapanno 'pi alaṅkāro doṣānuviddhaḥsan ābhāsī bhavatīti vyutpādya samyagudājihīrṣurāha-tattu yatheti //
GK16ruyalscu:1392: tenonnaddhaḥ utsikto janaḥ śṛṅgārī lokaḥ tasyābhimānaḥsāntvāsahiṣṇutā /
GK16ruyalscu:1394: atra na maṇḍalam api tu ātapatramevetyanvayo ghaṭate ayamapahnavapūrvaka āropaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:1404: api tu ambhaḥ kaṇā eveti pratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1405: itthamevāpahnutim utprekṣāṅgatvena pratipipādayuṣurupakṣipati-atra śūnyaṃ ityasya ityādi //
GK16ruyalscu:1412: nanu cchralādiprayoge 'pyapahnavāropapaurvāparyaviparyayanibandhanaṃ vaicitryaṃ kiṃ nocyata ityata āha-etasminnapīti //
GK16ruyalscu:1418: ekavāsyatāyāṃ tu cchralādi śabdasya paurvāparyaviparyayaprasaṅge 'pi na pratītibhedaḥkaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:1419: kriyāviśeṣaṇatvena kriyāpekṣayā pratītau prāthamyaniyamāt atha śchrālādiprayoge dvidhā na gaṇitam /
GK16ruyalscu:1447: sa ca loke dvirūpaḥ samyagātmā mithyārūpaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:1449: nahi śuktiriti samyagadhyavasāye rajatamiti mithyādhyavasāye vā vicchittiḥ kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:1450: ubhaya visakṣaṇāstu jānato 'pyetasmin tadeveti yo 'dhyāsarūpasya ihālaṅkāratvena parigṛṅyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1455: itthaṃ ca satyadhyavasāye viṣayabhūte yadā adhyavasānasya prādhānyaṃ tadotprekṣālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1459: viṣayaṃ nigīrṇavato viṣayiṇo viṣayitādātmyena pratītasya ihādhyavasāyo abhimata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1461: vyāpāraprādhānyagrahaṇasya vyāvartyamuddhāṭayitumāha- sa ca dvividha ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1464: uttaravākyagato 'pi yacchabdaḥ pūrvavākyācchabdopādānanirapekṣa eva tadarthena sambandhamīṣṭe /
GK16ruyalscu:1465: yatra viṣayiṇo 'satyatayā pratītiḥ sa sādhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1467: mukhaṃ mukhatvena jānanneva yadā nūnaṃ candra iti saṃbhāvayati tadā viṣayī candro mukhatvenāsatyaḥ pratibhāti tadādhyavasāyaḥ sādhyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1468: nanu sādhya evāstu adhyavasāyaḥ siddho vā,
GK16ruyalscu:1469: abhedapratītau kathamasatyatvaṃ ityata āha- asatyatvaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1472: nūnaṃ candra ityasyāṃ daśāyāṃ viṣayiṇyeva saṃbhavatyayaṃ viṣathayetu na saṃbhavatīti pratīyamānatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1477: tadāśrayasya satyatvāsatyatva pratītirityata āha-dharmo guṇakriyārūpaḥ ityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1478: guṇakriyārūpa iti dharmasya sākalyakathanāt tadubhayamūlatayā utprekṣāsaṃbhavasmūcitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1479: asya hi dharmasya saṃbhavo 'saṃbhavaśca viṣayyāśrayatayā saṃbhavaḥ asaṃbhavastu viṣayāśrayatayā /
GK16ruyalscu:1481: kutaḥ? saṃbhavāśrayasya tatrāvasthāyāṃ paramārthabuddhyanudayāt asatyatvaṃ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1485: yata itthamadhyavasāyaḥ sādhyaḥ ataḥ utprekṣāyāmadhyavasāyavyāpārasyaiva prādhānyamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1488: sa iti dyotitaḥ ko 'sāvityata āha - yatra viṣayiṇo vastuta ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1489: yadā tu mukhamuddaśya candro 'pamiti prayogaḥ tadā vastuto 'satyo 'pi viṣayī satyatayā pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1494: yadā sādhyatvapratītiḥ tadādhyavasāyasya paryāyān vyutpādayati - tatra sādhyatveti /
GK16ruyalscu:1501: prakṛtaṃ hi lau kikaṃ kavikḷtpa vicchrattividhuratayā na vaicitryāya /
GK16ruyalscu:1507: atha saṃbhāvyasya hetvādi rūpatayā punastraividhyamāha-teṣu ca pratyekamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1513: lakṣaṇāparīkṣayostu kṛtayoḥ katicana hīyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1518: nimittānupādānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti yatpratijñātaṃ tatpramāṇo na draḍhayati-ivādyanupādāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1520: anupāttanimittakā hi yā vācyotprekṣā tasyām ivādyupādānabalādevotprekṣaṇapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1523: prāyograhaṇāt paryāyoktanayena svarūpasya kvacitsaṃbhavadapyutprekṣaṇaṃ gamyasyāpibhaṅgyantarābhidhānānna nirāpaṇārhamiti dyotitam /
GK16ruyalscu:1537: tathā ca pratyekaṃ triskandhikā etā hetusvarūpaphalotprekṣaṇatayā skandhatrayamapi pratisvamaṣṭavidham /
GK16ruyalscu:1543: anayaivarītyā svarūpotprekṣāskandhaḥ phalotprekṣāskandhaśca pratisvamaṣṭavidheti jātyutprekṣā triskandhatayā caturviśatidhā /
GK16ruyalscu:1547: pratīyamānāyāṃ tu anupāttanimittāyā niravaśeṣaṃ pāte aṣṭacatvāriśaddhāniḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1567: ye ca vakṣyante teṣāṃ vaicitryādasyā iyattaiva nāstītyāha-ataścoktavakṣyamāṇetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1568: nanu yadyānantyaṃ kathamudāharaṇato darśayiṣyate ityata āha-sāmpratantvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1570: yathā diṅmātreṇodāhṛtā api nyāyataḥsākalyena jñātuṃ śakyate,
GK16ruyalscu:1577: tatra yadyapi svarūpamutprekṣyate na tu hetuphale,
GK16ruyalscu:1584: na ca mantavyaṃ varṣaṇasya nabhaḥkartṛkatvāt na tamogatatvamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1585: nabhaso 'pi tamasādhiṣṭhintasyaiva varṣaṇakartṛkatvasaṃbhavādanena paraṃparāyātāyā api sambhāvanāyā utprekṣātvaṃ dyotitam /
GK16ruyalscu:1601: udāharaṇacatuṣke 'pi anugataṃ viśeṣam uddhāṭayati-etāni bhāvābhimāna ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1621: atha nimittopādānānupādānābhyāṃ ṣoḍaśakasya yaddvaividhyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tatra nimittopādānasya samanantarodāharaṇānyevodāharaṇatvena darśayati - ete nimittetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1623: atra lepanāditvena saṃbhāvane vyāpanādi nimittaṃ nopāttam /
GK16ruyalscu:1654: arthāśriyāpi dharmaviṣaye śliṣṭa śabdahetukā saṃbhavatīti yoddiṣṭā tāmudāharati-śliṣṭaśabdetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1659: mārgaṇaviṣayībhāvo dharmaḥ saṃbhāvanāśaṃ eva pratītiviśrānteḥ śleṣo notprekṣābādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1665: “sarvaprātipadikebhya upamānārthe kvip ityeke ācāryā” iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1667: kaṇṭhatviṣāṃ tilakādirūpatvaniyamāsiddheḥ tilakādirūpatāpi kadācitsyādupamānāṃśe saṃbhāvanāprāṇatvameva natu vāstavatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1670: upamānasya tilakādeḥ prakṛte kaṇṭhatviṅruḍpe saṃbhavaicityāt saṃbhāvanamātrasyocitatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1681: yattu vyaktivivekakṛdīddaśi viṣaye manyate-“ivādiśabdaireva prakṛtārthasyāsattvapratīteḥ chralādiśabdāḥ punaraktā” iti tat mandam /
GK16ruyalscu:1682: na khalvīddaśi viṣaye chalādiśabdāprayoge 'pi prakṛtārthasyāsatyāsatyatā gamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1683: api tu utprekṣāṃ prati hetubhāva eva /
GK16ruyalscu:1687: athotprekṣāyā eva prapañcanārthaṃ tattadalaṅkārabījabhūta tattatpadāvāpoddhārābhyām alaṅkāravaicitryamāvirbhavatīti vyutpādayati-apara ivetyādinā
GK16ruyalscu:1693: kutracittu kāmacāraḥ iti vyutpipādayiṣurhetūtprekṣāṃ tāvat vyutpādayati-tadevaṃprakāretyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:1696: sa dharmo 'dhyavasāyavaśāt abhedopacaraṇavaśāt abhinna utprekṣānimittamāśrīyate niyamena vācyo bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:1698: yadaivaṃ na syāt tadotprekṣamāṇo heturabhittikameva citraṃ syādityāha-anyathā kaṃ pratīti /
GK16ruyalscu:1700: atra kapolau prakṛtau tatsaṃbandhī dharmaḥ kṣāmatā taddhetutvena darśanamutprekṣatam /
GK16ruyalscu:1701: tadutprekṣaṇe ca na kevalā kapolakṣāmatā nimittam,
GK16ruyalscu:1702: api tu loke parasparamadraṣṭroryā kṣāmatā tadabhinnatvenā dhyavasitā saivaṃ cotprekṣitā darśanalakṣaṇasya hetoḥ phalam /
GK16ruyalscu:1705: adarśanaṃ pratya prakṛtaiva hi kṣāmatā phalaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:1711: tadutprekṣaṇe ca laukikaduḥkhamaunatvābhedenādhyavasitaṃ nūpuramaunitvameva nimittaṃ duḥkotprekṣaṇaphalaṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:1721: atha dharmasya dharmigatatvenādhyavasāne nimittopādānānupādāne darśayati-yatra ca dharmaṃ evetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1728: nanu dharme dharmotprekṣaṇavaicitryāya vyāpane lepanamutprekṣyatāmityata āha-vyāpānādau tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1732: ato 'navagatasya kalpanamavagatasya parityāga iti doṣadvayamāpatediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1734: yadi vyāpanameva utprekṣaṇaviṣayaḥ na hi tasyagamyamānatā yuktā /
GK16ruyalscu:1749: tadanupādāne parivartamānaṃ utprekṣyamāṇaṃ kasya phalaṃ syāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1751: anenāśīcilidhatvena dṛṣṭeṣu prabhedeṣu punaḥ keṣāñcit pātodarśitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1752: tathāhi-upāttanimittā ye ṣoḍaṣabhedāsteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ hetusvarūpa phalotprekṣaṇarūpatve aṣṭacatvāriṃśat /
GK16ruyalscu:1762: atha manyepramukhasya śabdasya saṃbhāvanādyotakatve 'pi tatprayogamātreṇotprekṣābhramo na kārya iti vyutpādayati-asyāścetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1773: hetau svarūpe cotprekṣye phale ṣaṇṇāvatiḥ punaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1800: atra mukhanayanagātralakṣaṇānviṣayān nigīrya kamalakuvalayakanakalatālakṣaṇā viṣayiṇaḥ tadabhedenādhyavasitāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1816: bālānāṃ tu yatkiñciditi nūtanaṃ vastu draṣṭavyamityeva,
GK16ruyalscu:1818: yadvā pratyekaṃ samastā rucyarthitvavyutpattayobhedadṛṣṭau nimittaṃ prapañcitam ullekhaprastāve /
GK16ruyalscu:1829: atra puṣpapravālādikayoḥ sākṣādasambandhe 'pi yadīti saṃbhāvanayā sambandhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1831: na ca mantavyaṃ saṃbhāvanāyāṃ vyāpāraprādhānyāt atrotprekṣaiveyamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1836: atra dāhabāṣpaśvāsavapuṣāmambhaḥ prasṛtiṃ pacatvapraṇālocitatvadīpakalikāpreṅkholanapāṇḍimamajjaneṣu saṃbandhābhāve api siddhatvenoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1847: atra tvāyāto mṛtā iti niṣṭhābhyāṃ tayoḥsamakālatā /
GK16ruyalscu:1848: nanu bhede 'bhedādikatha namasaṅgatam ityata āha-eṣu pañcasviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1850: ato bhede 'bhedarūpo mukhyārtho na vivakṣita itiyāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:1853: yadiha bhede 'bhedādirūpāyā atiśayoktinimittabhūtaṃ prayojakamatiśayākhyaṃ phalaṃ tatrābhedādhyavasāyo,
GK16ruyalscu:1857: sahābhedenādhyavasitaṃ sadbhede 'bhedādivacanasya nimittaṃ kamalamukhādikayorabhedādhyavasāyo yojayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1858: tathāsati avyātpidoṣaḥ syādityata āha-abhede bheda ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1862: abhede vāstave yadā bhedakathanaṃ na hi tadā phalinorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1863: phalaṃ tu tatrāpyabhedenaivādhyavasīyata ityata āha-aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ ityādāviti /
GK16ruyalscu:1864: aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaamityādau hi yat vastu tasmiddhaṃ laḍahatvaṃ yaccānyatvena kavisamarpitaṃ sātiśayaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:1868: tatrāpi khalu “lāvaṇyadraviṇe“tyādau vedhaso lāvaṇyardraviṇasambandhe 'pyasaṃbandhaḥ kevalaṃ na punastanvyā naisargikalāvaṇyakavisamarpitavedhaḥsambandhi lāvaṇyayorasaṃbandhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1872: kāryatāśrayatvāt tatrāpi saṅgatiḥ prapañcārthatvāt nānarthakyamiti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:1878: aupamyasya gamyatve padārthagatatvena prastutānāmaprastutānāṃ vā samānadharmābhisambandhe tulyayogitā // RuAss_23 //
GK16ruyalscu:1907: aśvapṛtanāyāḥsakāśāt gūrñjaranṛpasya bhagrasya mukhe patitaṃ rajaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1914: tvadaṅgamārdavaṃ paśyataḥ sarvasyaiva citte mālatyādīnāṃ kaṭhoratāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1929: yaścātropamānopameyabhāvaḥ sa tulyayogitāto vilakṣaṇa ityāha-sa cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1937: nanu pratisvaṃ kriyāsambandhe kathaṃ padārthagataṃ ityata āha-anekasyaikakriyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1941: rājate mihireṇa nabho rasena kāvyaṃḥ sareṇa yauvanam /
GK16ruyalscu:1950: kriyāyāḥ prathama padatvam tantramiti dyotayitum-(yathā veti) /
GK16ruyalscu:1955: kṛpaṇānāṃ dhanaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇāmaṇiḥ kesarāṇi siṃhānām /
GK16ruyalscu:1967: vākyārthagatatvena sāmānyasya vākyadvaye pṛthaṅnirdeśa prativastūpamā // RuAss_25 //
GK16ruyalscu:1969: iha nānālaṅkāra śaṅkāmapanetuṃ viṣayaṃ vibhajati-tatra sāmānyadharmasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1970: ittā(ivā?)dikamupādāya sāmānyadharmasya sakṛnnirdeśa upamāyāmevodāhṛtaṃ 'prabhāmahatyāśikhayeva dīpa' iti /
GK16ruyalscu:1972: ivādikamanupādāya yathā sakṛnnirdeśastadā prastutāprastutānāṃ samastatve dīpakaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:1983: nanu yadi dharmasyāsakṛnnirdeśarūpaṃ śuddhasāmānyarūpatvaṃ tadā kiṃ paryāyāntareṇetyata āha-kevalaṃ kāvyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1993: dharmasya śuddhasāmānyarūpatāṃ paryāyāntaratvaṃ ca darśayati-atra caturatvamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2004: atra bahūnāṃ vānarabhaṭaiḥ manthācalena sahadharmyapekṣo bimbapratibimbabhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2005: divyavāgupāsanasya abdhilaṅghanena gurukliṣṭatvasyā pātālanimagratvena ca dharmāpekṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2006: nanu jānāti jānīta iti jñānasya pṛthaṅnirdeśāt kathamidaṃ dṛṣṭāntodāharaṇamityata āha-atra yadyapītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2010: yatra tu vivakṣā tatra na kiñcinnyūnamityata āha-yannibandhanaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2013: tvayā manasi garvābhimukhe kṛte tatkṣaṇameva dviṣo nihatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2023: saṃbhavatāsaṃbhavatā vā vastusambandhena gamyamānaṃ pratibimbakaraṇaṃnidarśanā // RuAss_27 //
GK16ruyalscu:2029: yo girirāgataṃ abhyāgataṃ raviṃ satāṃ ātitheyī atithisatkṛtiḥ kāryeti bodhayan dhatte /
GK16ruyalscu:2031: bo dhanasamarthasya ācārogirau prayiktaḥ tasyācetantve 'pi kārīṣo 'griradhyāpayatītivat
GK16ruyalscu:2032: giriḥ gṛhamedhino bodhanakriyāsamarthān karotīti tatsāmarthyācaraṇo ṇicaḥ prayogāt
GK16ruyalscu:2038: nanu tarhi asaṅgatireva syādityata āha-laulāsadṛśīṃ līlāmityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2044: mārjanameva pāṇḍurīkaraṇaṃ na bhavati yataḥ atra yeṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntadhīḥ te mandā ityāha-kecidityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2046: sāpekṣatve tu nidarśanetyāha-yatra tu prakṛta ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2047: sāmānādhikaraṇye nādhyaropyata iti vākyaikatāśrayaṇena ekakriyānvayāt prakṛtāntaḥ pātitvaṃ nīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2049: yatrāpyanatisphuṭaṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntadhīrmābhūditi udāharaṇena darśayati-evaṃ caśuddhāntetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2050: āśramavāsino janasya śuddhāntadurlabhaṃ vapuryadīti yacchrabda uttaravākye tarhidūrīkṛtā iti tacchrabda mutthāpayati iti vākyārthayoḥ sāpekṣatvānnidarśanaiva iyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2057: viyogena nimittena pāṇḍarībhūtānāṃ nārīṇāṃ gaṇḍataleyaḥ pāṇḍimāsakharjurī mañjarīgarbhareṇuṣvalakṣyatetyatra
GK16ruyalscu:2058: upameyavṛttasya gaṇḍapāṇḍimro mañjarīgarbhareṇurūpa upamānavṛtterlakṣyatvāsaṃbhavāt upamā pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2060: asyaiva ca prakārasya vaicitryāntarāyāha-eṣa prakāra upameyavṛttasya upamānavṛtte 'nvayāsaṃbhavalakṣaṇām /
GK16ruyalscu:2072: araṇyeti araṇyaruditaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛśoduḥkhātibhārasya duḥkhabhāgijanamantareṇa anubhūtatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2074: tathāvidhasya saṃskārasya tasya vā svasya vā anyeṣāṃ vā bhogāyogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2083: abudho janaḥ sevito yaditi vākyārthena viśeṣito yacchabdaḥ pradhāna vākyārthabhūtā(m)
GK16ruyalscu:2086: atha śābdopādānāṃ vināpi arthākṣepādeva nidarśanāvaicitryaṃ bhavatītyāha-kvacitpunarityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2101: bhedaprādhānye upamānādupameyasyādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ // RuAss_28 //
GK16ruyalscu:2109: atra anivartino yauvanasya kṣayiṇo 'pi bhūyo 'bhivardhitaśaśivyapekṣayā nyūnaguṇatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:2116: nanu sahārtha tayā tulyakakṣyayoḥ kathaṃ bhedapradhānatetyata āha-guṇapradhānabhāvetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2119: bhedaprādhānyaṃ tu vyatirekanayena sādhārmyabhitti kamiha na bhavati api tu guṇā pradhānabhāvabhittikamiti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:2121: sahārtho hi tṛtīyāṃ taṃ guṇatvena prayojayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2122: nanu sahārthatve ka upamānopameyabhāva ityata āha-upamānopameyatvaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2125: ato vaivakṣikameva na tu vāstavamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2127: nanu dvayoḥ prākaraṇikatvamevāprākaraṇikatvameva vetikiṃ niyāmakamityata āha-sahārthasāmarthyāditi /
GK16ruyalscu:2128: nanu tarhi vaivakṣikatve katarat kena rūpeṇa vivakṣyatāmityata āha-tṛtīyāntasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2130: sahaśabdo hi niyamena tṛtīyāntasya śābdaguṇatvaṃ kalpayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2136: evaṃ nyāyakrame sthite 'pi viśeṣo 'nyo 'syāḥ prayojaka ityāha-tatrāpītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2137: atiśayoktirapi na sākalyena asyā mūlamityata āha-sā cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2138: kāryakāraṇapratiniyamaviparyayo 'tra tulyakālatā na tu kāryasya pūrvakālatā sahārthatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2142: kartṛkarmādi sāhityanibandhanenāpi prābhedena prathata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:2150: aparādhānāṃ ca tṛtīyāntatvāt viśeṣaṇānāmupamānatvaṃ niyatamaparādhā yathā vardhanta iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2151: santāpasya tu pradhānatvādupameyatvaṃ santāpastathā vardhata iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2157: astaṃ bhāsvāniti-saṃhriyantāṃ viprakīrṇāni ekīkriyantāmityarthaḥ atra śleṣābhittikābhedādhyavasāyarūpā mūlamiti darśayati-atrāstaṅgamanamityādi
GK16ruyalscu:2160: evamatiśayoktimūlatvādilakṣaṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadabhāve sahoktimātraṃ nālaṅkāra iti vyutpādayati-etadviśeṣeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2167: dyujanamṛtyoḥ ātpikriyāpekṣayā kartṛtve 'pi tasyopasarjanatvāt neha kartṛsāhityam /
GK16ruyalscu:2185: bhārgavāhaṅkṛtikandalasya tu dhanurbhaṅgāntamabhagrasya bhaṅgasamasamayaṃ bhaṅgaḥśrīmatā rāmacandreṇākārīti samanvayāt karmasāhityamiha mālātvenāvatiṣṭhate
GK16ruyalscu:2196: kañcidarthaṃ vinā yatra śobhanatvaṃ nāsti saikā vinoktaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2203: na hyasmin sati tattvamasattvaṃvetyuktau vicchittiḥ kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:2206: sattvalaṅkāraphalatvena prātpe prakāśyata ityāha-evaṃ cānyanivṛttāvapi ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2210: vinayādiṣu ca satsu śrīprabhṛtisadbhāvaḥ phalatvena prakāśyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2212: vinādi śabdābhāve tadarthaṃ sadbhāve vinoktireveti vyutpādayitumāha-atra vinā śabda ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2216: atra tuhināśudarśanaṃ vinā nalinījanma na śobhanamiti pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2220: atra ca hetuhetumadbhāvavyaktayo vinoktereva vicchittiviśeṣādhāyakaḥ na punaralaṅkārāntaramityāha-iyaṃ ca parasparetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2224: loke hi mṛgalocanāṃ vinā vicitravyavahārapratibhāprāgalbhyaṃ nāsti suhṛdā vinā ca sundarāśayatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:2231: atha viśeṣaṇavicchittimūlau samāsoktiparikarau prastauti - adhunā viśeṣaṇeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2232: viśeṣaṇa vicchittiśca dvirūpā sābhyaṃ sābhiprāyatā ca /
GK16ruyalscu:2236: yatra viśeṣyāṃśe prakṛtamātraparatā viśeṣaṇasāmyāt punaraprakṛto 'vagamyate sā samāsena saṃkṣepeṇā abhidhānāt samāsoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2247: yadā purgamyatvaṃ prastutaviṣayaṃ viśeṣaṇasāmyāt tadānīma prastutapraśaṃsā,
GK16ruyalscu:2249: aprastutasya gamyatve yadi viśeṣyasyāpi sāmyaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-viśeṣyasyāpi sāmye śleṣaprāpteriti /
GK16ruyalscu:2251: nanu śleṣālaṅkāraḥ śabdaśaktimūladhvaniśceti triṣu viṣayeṣvapyasti śliṣṭapadāpanibandhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2252: tatra yadā śleṣaḥ tadārthadvayasya niyamena vācyatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2253: vācyatvaṃ caivaṃ saṃbhavati-yadārthau dvāvapi prākaraṇikau staḥ aprākaraṇikau vā tadā viṣeṣaṇaviṣyāṃśayordvayorapi śliṣṭapadopanibandhāt śleṣālaṅkāraḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2255: atha yadaikasya prākaraṇikatvamitarasya aprākaraṇikatvaṃ tadā viśeṣyāṃśe pṛthak śabdopādānabalādeva śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2256: yadi viśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śliṣṭapadopanibandhaḥ tadā prakaraṇaniyantritāyā abhidhāyāḥ prākaraṇikārthaḥ evopakṣayāda prākaraṇikarthāvagatirvyañjanasyaiva viṣayaḥsyāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2260: yadā punaḥ prākaraṇikāprākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śliṣṭatā tadā tāvanna samāsoktiḥ viśeṣaṇamātrasāmyalakṣaṇā yataḥ śleṣālaṅkāratvaprātpirapi
GK16ruyalscu:2262: na hyatra dvayorvācyatopapattiḥ prakaraṇapakṣapātinyā abhidhāyā aprākaraṇiker'the
GK16ruyalscu:2269: ato viśeṣyāṃśe saṃsparśābhāvādviśeṣyaṃ prakṛtārthaṃ na svena rūpeṇa rūpavantaṃ kartumīṣṭe
GK16ruyalscu:2270: kindu viśeṣaṇāṃśapratītaṃ svavyavahāraṃ viśeṣaṇāṃśapratīte prakṛtārthavyavahāre 'vacchredakatvena samāropayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2275: nanu yadā rūpasamāropaḥ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-rūpasamāropetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2299: upoḍharāgatvādiśliṣṭa viśeṣaṇamahinmā khalvatra niśāśaśinau nāyakavyavahāra viśiṣṭau pratīyete /
GK16ruyalscu:2300: nanu katham atra nirjñāyate vyavahārasamāropo na rūpasamāropa ityata āha-aparityaktetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2301: yadi rūpasamāropastadā prakṛtau rūpakanyāyena svaṃ svaṃ rūpamavacchrāditatvena parityajya yadavacchrādakamupamānarūpaṃ tādrūpyamupagṛhṇāti /
GK16ruyalscu:2302: iha punarviśeṣyāṃśe niṣpratiyogikatayā jñātayorata evāparityakta sva rūpayoḥ niśāśaśinorviśeṣaṇasāmyāvagamitena nāyakatvadharmeṇa viśiṣṭatayā pratīteḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2307: iha tanutvādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmubhayatraikārthatāsāmyaṃ na tu śliṣṭatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2309: nanu tanutvādidharmasāmyāt kathaṃ latāvyavahārapratītirityata āha-tatra ca lataiketyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2310: vikāso hi latāyā eva tatsamāropo lolākṣyā latāvyavahārapratīteḥ kāraṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:2312: yathaivaṃ viśeṣaṇasādhāraṇyaṃ dharmasamāropaśca vyavahārasamāropasya kāraṇaṃ tathā kāryasamāropo 'pīti vyutpādayutumāha-evaṃ ca kāryetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2313: kāryasamāropanibandhano hi bheda iha dharmasamāropanītyā sujñānaḥ upari ca śuddhatvena pṛthagrāśīkariṣyati /
GK16ruyalscu:2322: atrānapekṣitākhyāne vākye śravaṇa samanantarameva dantaprabhāpuṣpacitatvādinā hetunā hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ suveṣatā pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2324: atha dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairiti madhyamapadalopi samāsāntarapratyāyitaiḥ puṣpapallavādibhiḥ viśeṣaṇāsāmyadaśāyāṃ latāvyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2328: rūpasamārope tu rūpakamiti pratipāditam yataḥ ataḥ pratīto 'pi rūpakasamāsa iha nyāyato na prāpnoti /
GK16ruyalscu:2329: nanvevamādau prāgupamāsamāsāsasamāśrayaṇanimittaṃ yadi suveṣatvādinā nopāttaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-atraiva parītetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2332: uta dantaprabhā eva puṣpāṇītyādiko rūpakasamāsa iti sandehaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:2335: na ca mantavyaṃ samāsaḥ sandeho papanna iti,
GK16ruyalscu:2338: atha sandehopaśamakāle dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairityādi pūrvavadeva madhyamapadalopasamāsaḥ latāvyavahārapratītau samāsoktāveva viśrantiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2339: itthaṃ ca sati upamā samāsagarbhatayā saṅkarasamāsagarbhatayā ca samāsoktibhedo 'yaṃ dvidhā darśito mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2340: nanu kevalarūpakasamāsāśrayeṇāpi samāsoktibhedo 'yaṃ kiṃ neṣyata ityata āha-rūpakagarbhatvena tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:2341: prāk rūpakasamāse atha tadgarbhatayopamāsamāsāśraye yadyapi viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ bhavatyeva,
GK16ruyalscu:2344: nanu upamāsamāse saṅkarasamāse ca samāsoktivaiparthyaṃ kiṃ na syādityāha-na ca prāṅnidarśitetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2350: ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye rūpakaprātpau samāsokte prātpiriti sodāharaṇaṃ darśayitumāha-taccaikadeśavivartītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2352: payodo vidyunnayanairniśāyāmabhisārikāyāḥ mukhaṃ nirīkṣya dhārānipātaiḥ saha candro mayā vānta iti dhiyevārtataraṃ rarāsetyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2353: atrāśliṣṭam ekadeśavivartirūpakaṃ samāsokternāvakāśaṃ dadātīti darśayati-atra nirīkṣaṇetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2355: ataḥ puruṣānusāreṇa yojane vidyuta eva nayanānīti rūpakameva na punarupamā saṅkaro vā /
GK16ruyalscu:2357: taccedamārtataraṃ rarāseti pratīyamānotprekṣāyā eva nimittaṃ samāsokte raprātpireveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2361: eṣu rūpaṇasāmarthyānmadano mahārājatayā madhuśca śrīkaraṇāgraṇītvena rūpitaḥ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2363: nanu patrāṇīvetyādirupamā kiṃ na syādityata āha-dvirephamaṣītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2364: maṣīyogo hi madhāvasaṃbhavannupamā samāsaṃbādhitvā gaṇakavṛtteḥ saṃbhavastadanusāreṇa rūpakasamāsaṃ sādhayatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:2365: nanu samāsoktiprastāve kiṃ sodāharaṇaṃ rūpakabhedapradarśanenetyata āha-asya ca pracura ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2378: itthaṃ viśeṣaṇasāmyātpañcaprakāratvasiddhā vavāntaraṃ viśeṣasahitāmimāṃ punastrirāśikatayā saṃcaṣṭe-itthaṃ śuddhakāryetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2379: kāryasya śuddhatvaṃ nāma nirūpita viśeṣaṇasāmyā saṃkīrṇatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2384: yadā punaridamanupacaritaṃ tadā pañcadhodāhṛtam prāk sa dvitīyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2386: anupacaritaviśeṣaṇasāmyanibandhanasya nyāyanirbharatvena prāk pradarśanaṃ pañcavidhatvena kṛtamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2389: anyadātvanupacaritaṃ anugatamekarūpaṃ tu prayojanaṃ nānupaśyāma ityata āha-sarvatra cātretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2391: tasya cāturvidhyaṃ darśayati-sa ca laukika ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2393: anena ca vyavahārasamāropacāturvidhyena rāśitrayamapi pratyekaṃ caturdhā prathate /
GK16ruyalscu:2400: atropacaritatvādaprastutāvagatau viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ nātibaddhabharam api tu śuddhakāryasamāropa eva ityāha-atra patrāvalītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2411: eṣitriṣu rāśiṣu vyavahārasamāropa vaicitryanibandhanāt bhedānupadarśayitukāma āha-vyavahārasamāropetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2435: parameśvarasya hi sarvavṛttiṣvakatvaṃ rūpamavyayatvaṃ asaṃkhyatā na kutaścidapideśakālāderbheda iti idameva lakṣaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:2437: atha sarvāsu kārikādivṛttiṣvekatvādisaṃkhyārahitamavyaye hi syāditi pratiyogyekatvaṃ nāsti kiṃ tvabhedaikatvamevar /
GK16ruyalscu:2438: idṛśamavyayaṃ paśyadbhiḥ paratvajuṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paratvalakṣaṇāyāḥ vibhakteḥ prathamāderlopaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2446: arthādanāpātādarthāpatterna ca na yaditi pramāṇānuktāvapi vastutar idṛśi lāvaṇye mīmāṃsādisiddhādṛṣṭādivastusamāropaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2457: yadvā candramasa iti viśeṣyādhyāhārādoṣadhipaterityetat viśeṣaṇātayā vivakṣiṇīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2460: jñeyaścāsau pārimityaṃ jahāti na vaktuṃ śakyaḥ na ca lakṣayituṃ kintu guruvaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2462: atra guṇagaṇe śṛṅgārādirasavyavahāraḥ samāropita ityāha-atra bharatetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2467: tātparyaṃ hi nāma abhihitānvayamate samanvayaśaktiḥ abhidhottīrṇā samanvayamātra viśrāntayānayā samanvayasamanantara pratītiko raso na jñāyate
GK16ruyalscu:2470: mukhyārthabādhādyabhāvannāpi lakṣyaḥ api tu vedyāntaravigalanādaparimitaḥsan abhidhālakṣaṇātātparyottīrṇena
GK16ruyalscu:2471: vyañjanākhyena kāvyaikagāminā śāstrāntarāpūrveṇa vyāpāreṇa viṣayīkriyamāṇo laukikatvāt
GK16ruyalscu:2472: anukāryamabhinayaprayāsanighnatvāt anukartāraṃ ca parihṛtya sahṛdayaikagata iti budhairavasīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2476: saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vitatya kṛta iti tata evāvadhārya ityalam /
GK16ruyalscu:2479: atraidupahvaram-vāgdevatā hi parā paśyantī madhyamāvaikharī ceti catuṣpadaparimitā /
GK16ruyalscu:2480: tatra nāmarūpātmakaṃ prapañcaṃ svātmanyupasaṃhṛtya svarūpajyotīrūpiṇī jāgaritādidhāmatrayollaṅghinī parā /
GK16ruyalscu:2483: pārāyāḥ sakāśāduditā maṇipūrakāt anāhatāvadhi prāṇaparispandotkṣubhitabuddhivṛttyabhimāninī varṇapadādiparigrahāntaḥsaṃjalapātmikā paśyantīprabhāvā svapnavṛttirmadhyamā /
GK16ruyalscu:2486: atha saṃhārāvasare jāgaritalayapuraskāreṇa vaikharī madhyamāyāṃ līyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2491: itthaṃ ca sati śaktimānātmā parāyāṃ turīyāṃ ,
GK16ruyalscu:2497: tava parayā devyā saha krīḍādṛḍhāliṅgane aprayāsena tādṛśī samādhisāmarasye pravṛtte
GK16ruyalscu:2498: bāhyā vāk kathaṃ cāṭūccāraṇācāpalaṃ sphuṭatālvoṣṭhapuṭavyāpāramakhatatāṃ kathaṃ nāma
GK16ruyalscu:2500: kuto nāstītyata āha-ābhyantarī paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati,
GK16ruyalscu:2505: tatra vaikharī kathaṃ nāma pravartatām iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2507: yathā parayodevyā paṭṭamahiṣyā saha tava kriḍādṛḍhāliṅgane pravartamāne anyā kācidābhyantarī ābhyantaratvādeva yuvayorāliṅganaṃ paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati gopayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2509: madhyamāvṛttirmadhuradhvaniḥ yathā bhavati tathā ujjihāsārasāt truṭyatiṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:2511: tatra bāhyā parigrahaveśyā cāṭūccāraṇacāpalaṃ kathaṃ vitanutāmiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2516: śuddhakāryasamārope hi vilikhati kucāvityādau yat kucavilekhanādi ha(ṭha)
GK16ruyalscu:2518: kakāryaṃ tasya yadyapi na mukhyatayā yat khadirādiviśeṣaṇatvaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:2522: atha yatra samāsokterasāmañjasyaṃ tatra nyāyasañcāreṇa samañcāreṇa samañjasīkartumāha-iha tvityādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2524: ārdranakhakṣatābham aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa dadhānā sakalaṅkaminduṃ prasādayantī śaradravestāpabhabhyadhikaṃ cakāra /
GK16ruyalscu:2537: aindraṃ dhanuḥ śarada evaviśeṣaṇaṃ na nāyikāyāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2538: nanvārdranakhakṣatābhamiti viśeṣaṇaupamyādekadeśavivartinyupamā śaradi tatsāmarthyādinduravyoḥ nāyakatvapratītirastvityata āha-na caikadeśeti
GK16ruyalscu:2546: nanu yadyekadeśavivartinyupamāyā iha saṃbhavaḥ tadaryupamālaṅkārasyaiva prātpirma samāsokterityata āha-athātretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2559: anyaniṣṭhasya dharmasyānyatra saṃcāraṇaṃ kutra dṛṣṭamityata āha-yathā dadhnetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2560: dadhnā juhotītyatra hi havanagatatvena vidhiḥ pratītaḥ sa tvagnihotraṃ juhotītya(ta)
GK16ruyalscu:2565: atha yatra nyāyataḥ samāsoktimapohya ekadeśavivartinyupamaiva prathate taṃ viṣayaṃ darśayitumāha-iha punariti /
GK16ruyalscu:2567: atra saraḥśriyāṃ nāyikātvapratītau nimittaṃ vivacayati-saraḥ śriyamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2571: na tu vyavahārasasāropeṇa saraḥśrīdharmatayā ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinī upamaivopāsyā /
GK16ruyalscu:2576: samprati sādhiteti vyāghāta ityata āha-yatra tu keśapāśetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2577: dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīvetyādi samāsenoktāyāmupamāyāṃ satyāmapi dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairivetyādi samāsāntaramahimnā viśeṣaṇasāmyamupapadyate
GK16ruyalscu:2579: samprati tu netrairivetyatra gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinyupamaiva vyavasthāpiteti vyaghātābhāvāt sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:2580: athārthāntaranyāsa prabhāvitāyāmasyāṃ vaicitryāntaraṃ astītyāha - sā cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2589: upagūḍhatvaṃ śāntataṭitkaṭākṣatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ tadutthāpitayā samāsoktyā nāyakavyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2590: tathā sati samāsoktyāliṅgito yo 'yaṃ viśeṣātmā sa sāmānyātmanā arthāntaranyāsena samarthyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2592: paribhraṣṭapayodharāṇāmiti śleṣavaśādupagūḍha iti viśeṣaṇaṃ sādhāraṇatayā sphuṭam /
GK16ruyalscu:2622: prasannagaṃbhīratvaṃ nāma padānāṃ vyāṅgyārthagarbhīkāra eva na tu vyaṅgyasya vācyātiśāyitā /
GK16ruyalscu:2631: kurubāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca na niḥsahāyasya /
GK16ruyalscu:2635: jīvatā eva na tu mūrcchitasya mṛtasya vā /
GK16ruyalscu:2645: arthadvayasya yadā prākaraṇikatvamaprākaraṇikatvameva vā tadā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ śabdasāmye śleṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2646: yadā tūbhayamayatvaṃ arthadvayasya tadā viśeṣyāṃśe pṛthagupādāne śleṣa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2652: viśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śabdasāmyaṃ tadā arthaprakaraṇādinā abhidhāniyāsyāt na tu śleṣasya /
GK16ruyalscu:2653: anekārtho hi śabdaḥ prakaraṇādinā prākaraṇika evārthe niyamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2654: ādye tu prakāradvaye niyamahetvabhāvāt dvāvapi vācyau /
GK16ruyalscu:2655: itthaṃ sati vikalpo vyavatiṣṭhata ityāha-ata eveti /
GK16ruyalscu:2660: abhavena asaṃsāreṇa balidaityajitkāyaḥ purāmṛtasaṃvibhāgakāle strīkṛtaḥ strībhāvaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2663: agaṃ govardhanaṃ gāṃ mahīṃ ca yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ varāhāvatāre adhārayat /
GK16ruyalscu:2664: yasya ca stutyaṃ nāma amaraḥ śaśimacchirohara ityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2668: atha yena dhvastamanobhavena nāśitamanmathena balijitkāyaḥ viṣṇorvapuḥ purāṇāṃ saṃharaṇe astrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2669: yaścedvṛndrakalāvat stutyaṃ ca nāma hara ityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2673: lubdhairmadhulaṃpaṭaiḥ vyādhaiśca bhūriti kriyāviśeṣaṇam ekadā śilīmukhairbhramaraiḥ anyadā bhūribāṇaiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2700: puṣpeṣu kusumānatareṣu ruciṃ śobhāṃ puṣpabāṇapriyatāṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:2704: alaṅkārāntareṣvaprāpteṣu anārabhyamāṇo 'yaṃ niravakāśatvāt balīyāniti bādhitvā tatpratibhāmātra mutpādayatīti kecit /
GK16ruyalscu:2706: anye punaḥ “yena dhvastamanobhavene“ti alaṅkārāntaravivikto 'sya viṣayaḥ iti sāvakāśatvānnānyabādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2707: ato 'nyasampāte saṅkaraḥ nyāyato vā daurbalye bādhyatvamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2713: yatrobhayarūpānekārthagocaratvaṃ tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ tatra tu dīpakaṃ prabhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:2717: yata itthaṃ nāsya viviktaviṣayatā ato 'laṅkārāntarāṇi śleṣabādhitāni pratibhāmātrāvaśeṣāṇi bhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:2718: itthaṃ sati vivakto yaḥśāṅkito viṣayaḥ so 'pi avivikta evetyāha-yena dhvastetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2719: itthaṃ vivikto yaḥśāṅkito viṣayaḥ so 'pi avivikta evetyāha-yena dhvastetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2721: alaṅkāryalaṅkaraṇabhāvo hi āśrayāśrayibhāvenopapanno loke karṇāśritaḥ karṇālaṅkāra iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2724: nanu arthabhede śabdabhedo 'pi bhinna eveti raktacchradamityādāvapi na śabdaikyamityada āha-yadyapītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2728: ataḥ sāhityasaraṇeḥ pratītyaikasāratvāt śabdaikyapratipādakadarśanāvaṣṭāmbhācca nāsti śabdabhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2742: itthaṃ niravakāśatvobhayālaṅkāratvasiddhau sakalakalamityādau śleṣa eva nopamā /
GK16ruyalscu:2747: tarhi rūpakasamāsoktyoḥ kuto ca bādha ityata āha-śleṣagarbhetvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2748: rūpakaṃ hi siddhaśleṣamutthāpya svasvarūpa eva viśrāmyatīti śleṣabādhakaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2749: tatrāpi yadi śleṣaḥ pūrvasiddho rūpakamutthāpya yadi svarūpe viśrāmyati,
GK16ruyalscu:2757: samāsoktau tu śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇanibandhanāyāṃ viśeṣyāṃśasya gamyatvāt samāsoktireva bādhikā /
GK16ruyalscu:2761: jagatsu trayīmayatvena prathito 'pi vivasvān vāruṇīṃ prati yadagamat /
GK16ruyalscu:2764: pātityaṃ adhaḥ pradeśasaṃyogaḥ upahatiśca patitatvādeva śuddhyaibaḍavāgnimadhyaṃ viveśetyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2766: loketrayīmayasya sato vāruṇī sparśato yau pati tatvāgrapraveśau,
GK16ruyalscu:2770: yadyapyekaiva kriyā kartṛbhedabhinnā satyabhedenādhyavasitā sa tu tatkriyā(ekakriyā)
GK16ruyalscu:2773: ata eveti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭo yo virodhālaṅkāraḥ viruddhacaraṇābhāsarūpaḥ tenālaṅkṛtor'thaḥ pātityarūpa hetutvenotprekṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2778: tā, uttarakālaṃ tu virodhopaśama iti pratītikramaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2779: itthañca sati śleṣaḥ sarvabādhakaḥsan virodhālaṅkāraṃ bādhitvā pratibhāmātreṇāvasthāpayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2782: yatra tu nāṭakādau bhāvyarthopakṣepātmakaṃ bījanyāsalakṣaṇaṃ sūcakatvaṃ tatra mīmāṃsārthamāha-yatra tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2797: śleṣastu dvayorvācyatvābhāvāt sarvathā na pravartata iti dhvaneḥ eva viṣayo 'yam /
GK16ruyalscu:2799: śabdaśaktimūle hi dhvanau vācyapratīyamānayoḥ sambandhābhāvāt sambandhāyaupamyaklṝtpiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2800: sa(ca)sambandhaḥ aupamyānapekṣayā prakārāntareṇa yadi sūpapādaḥ tarhi upamādhvanau ko 'bhiniveśaḥ?
GK16ruyalscu:2803: ata eva dhvanikṛtā śabdaśaktimūlo dhvaniḥ alaṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśceti dvidhā nyāyata uktaḥ- alaṅkāro 'tha vastveva śabdādyatrāvabhāsate /
GK16ruyalscu:2806: itthaṃ ca sati prakṛte 'pi sūcakatvasambandhāt śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniravaseyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2809: kauśaikadik ulūkadiśā harṣātmikā te hi prabhāte harṣeṇa kūjanti /
GK16ruyalscu:2813: ākāśaṃ rāṣṭrasamaṃ icchyā tyaktvā valkalasadṛśadhūsarakāntidharaścandraḥ astaśailaṃ yau /
GK16ruyalscu:2814: atha tatkāntāpi niśā samullāsibhiralikulaiḥ krandhantaṃ sutamiva kumudākaraṃ sāntvayantī tena saha kṣipraṃ pratasthe /
GK16ruyalscu:2815: sūcanīye tvarthe viśvāmitrakrodhavaśāt icchyā rāṣṭraṃ tyaktvā vārāṇasīṃ prasthitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2816: tatkāntāpyauśīnarī krandantaṃ rohitāśvaṃ sutaṃ santvayantī tenaiva saha prasthiteti /
GK16ruyalscu:2818: nanu dhūsarakāntivalakaleti sutamiveti ca aupamyasambandhasadbhāvāt kathamayaṃ vastudhvanirityata āha-valkalasūtābhyāṃ tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:2821: ataḥ prakṛtena saha sūcanīyasya sūcanasambandhācca śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvanireva /
GK16ruyalscu:2823: atha yatra na tulyayogitā nāpi dīpakaṃ tatrāpi nāstyalaṅkārāntaravivikto 'sya viṣaya iti darśayituṃ āha-iheti /
GK16ruyalscu:2824: atra viśeṣaṇānāṃ alakākarṣavaktrāsañjanādīnāṃ vallabhaparatayā prathamaṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2825: atha itthaṃ vadantyāste lajjā pralīneti sakhīvyavahāke nahi nahīti vallabhasya nihnāvapuraḥsaraṃ kūrpāsakavalyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2826: atra hi na tulyayogitā dīpakaṃ vā ato vivikto 'yaṃ śleṣaviṣaya iti na śaṅkanīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2829: apahnavo hi vastutaḥsādṛśyārthaṃ pravarttate iha tu sādṛśyaṃ apahnavāya pravṛttimiti nāyamapahnava iti codyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2843: itthaṃ nyāyanirbhagharatayā anena prapañcito 'pi kāvyaprakāśakṛtā pratipadaṃ khaṇḍito 'yaṃ śleṣo 'laṃṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2845: saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ tu kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vitatya darśitā iti tat evāvadhāryāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2848: aprastutāt sā mānyaviśeṣabhāve kāryakāraṇabhāve sārūpye ca prastutapratītā vaprastutapraśaṃsā // RuAss_34 //
GK16ruyalscu:2855: tatra sāmānyādviśeṣasya viśeṣādvā sāmānyaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sārūpyaṃ ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:2856: tatra sāmānyadviśesaṣasya viśeṣādvā sāmānyasya pratītiriti dvaividhyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2861: athasarvaiveyaṃ vācyasya saṃbhavena ubhayarūpatayā ceti tridhā /
GK16ruyalscu:2862: śliṣṭaśabdaprayoge tu śleṣeṇa na bādhyate prastutasyāvācyatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2873: kiṃ tat? kamalinīpatre pāthasaḥ kaṇaṃ muktāmaṇirityāmaṃsteti yat /
GK16ruyalscu:2875: sa evātijaḍaḥ yastu muktāmaṇidhiyā'dīyamāne tatra pāthaḥkaṇe aṅgulyagrakriyāpravilayini satimama maṇiruḍaḍīya gata iti antaḥśucā na nidrāti
GK16ruyalscu:2878: kimiyaṃ prapadyata iti paśyāma iti dhiyā saṃlāpaparihārādirūpaṃ sthairyaṃ mayālambitam /
GK16ruyalscu:2879: tayā tu “ayaṃ khalu śaṭhaḥ māṃ na kimapyālapatīti“kopa āśritaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2880: ityanyonyavailakṣaṇyena darśanacature tasminnavasthāntare mayā vyājena hasitaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:2893: yena lambālaka iti-atra lambālakatvādinā kāryeṇa gajāsuravadharūpakāraṇapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2897: dvayorapi prastutatve kāraṇāpekṣayā kāryopavarṇanasya sacamatkāratve taddvārā kāraṇapratyāyanaṃ paryāyoktaviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2903: itthaṃ ca sati prakṛtasyaca sataur'thasya svopaskārāya prakṛtānatarāgūraṇe paryāyoktameveci prathanāya punarāha-tataśca anayetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2909: atra rājaśukavṛttasyāpi nāyakapratāpāṅgatayā prakṛtatvāt paryāyoktameva boddhavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2912: idṛśi viṣaye anyeṣāmaprastutapraśaṃsāsātve buddhāvapi na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:2914: kāryasyāprastutatve tu aprastutapraśaṃseti vibhāgasyānā kūlatvāt ityabhiprāyeṇāha-sarvatheti /
GK16ruyalscu:2915: atha etāni sādharmyodāharaṇatvena vijñeyānītyāha-etāni sādharmya iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2917: sārūpyahetukaṃ tu bhedam anayā nītyā sādharmyeṇa sujñānatvātāṃ vaidharmyaṇodāharati-dhanyā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2927: pramukha eva śākoṭakavṛttasya āropitatva pratīteryujyata evāsambhavaḥ vācyasya jahatsvārthalakṣaṇāmūlatvena atyantatiraskārāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2933: śleṣagarbhatve caitadeva draṣṭavyam chridrakaṇṭakaguṇānāṃ śliṣṭatvādityāha-etadeva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:2935: arthāntaranyāse hi sāmānyaviśeṣyayoḥ kāryakāraṇayośca vācyatvaṃ(dṛṣṭānte tu)
GK16ruyalscu:2948: ābhyāṃ sambandhābhyāṃ samarthyatvena nirdiṣṭasya prakṛtasya samarthanamarthāntaranyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2960: atra guṇasannipāte doṣanimajjanalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ sādharmyeṇa viśeṣasamarthakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2962: puṃsāṃ lokottaraṃ caritameva pratiṣṭhām arpayati audāryaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2968: sahaseti-kriyā dhyavasāyaḥ sahasāvidhānarūpo hyāvivekaḥ āpadāṃ padam anenāpatpadatvarūpaṃ kāryaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvarūpasya kāraṇasya vaidharmyeṇa samarthakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2970: sahasāvidhānābhāvātmano vimṛśyakāritvasya kāraṇasya sampadvaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sādharmyeṇa /
GK16ruyalscu:2971: atra sādharmyasya prāthamikatvāt uttarārdhārthapuraskāreṇa yojayati-atra sahasāvidhānetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2974: pṛthvīti-dvitayaṃ pṛthvī bhujaṅgarūpaṃ tat tritaye kūrmarāja yuktadvitayātmani /
GK16ruyalscu:2978: aho hīti-āyuṣā bahvaparāddhaṃ hi suhyadaḥ parābhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā ridṛśamapriyaṃ vaktavyatvenāpatitaṃ yataḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2987: samarthyatve na nirdiṣṭaḥ prakṛto yaḥ samarthyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3009: stutyā nindāyā gamyatve ekā nindayā stutestvanyā /
GK16ruyalscu:3010: ato vyājarūpāstutiḥ vyājena stutiriti ca vigrahaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3013: anugamena arthānvayena dvitīyā tu nindāvyājena stutiriti āha-yatrāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:3015: nanu stutinindayorgamyāṃśasya prastutatvāda prastutapraśaṃsātaḥ ko bheda ityata āha-stutinindeti /
GK16ruyalscu:3018: sa hi kadācideva parasya hitamādhāt tvaṃ tu ye yāvantastṛṣyanti,
GK16ruyalscu:3019: tebhyaḥsarvebhya eva vaimukhyalabdhānāmayaśobhārāṇaṃ prodvahane maroḥsāhāyarkaṃ karoṣi /
GK16ruyalscu:3024: urvīvalayatilaka indulakṣmādiṣu śyāmaleṣu satsu tvadyaśobhirnakiñciddhavalitaṃ iti stutirgamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3027: yatra tu gamyāṃśasya nyagbhāvastatra nāsyāḥsāmañjasyamiti darśayitumāha-kiṃ vṛttāntairiti /
GK16ruyalscu:3028: atra vallabhā bhramati hantetyuktyā nindāyāḥsutiparyavasāyitvaṃ na sphuṭībhāvati,
GK16ruyalscu:3037: uktavakṣyamāṇayoḥ prākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣapratītyarthaṃ niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepaḥ // RuAss_38 //
GK16ruyalscu:3038: uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya vā prākaraṇikasya viśeṣapratītyarthaṃ ābhāsato niṣedhanam ākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3042: ata eva vidheyasya sa kṛtaḥ aviṣaye pravartita ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3047: gajo hi snāta eva san sadyo dhūlidhūsaro bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:3050: tatra kasya kaḥ prakāra ityata āha-uktaviṣayatvenetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3066: bālaka/ nāhaṃ dūti tasyāḥ priyo 'sīti nāsmākaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3069: yati prasīdeti brūyāmasati kopa idaṃ vaco na ghaṭate /
GK16ruyalscu:3070: evaṃ na punaḥ kariṣyāmīti cedbrūyāṃ tathā vidyamānasyābhyupagamaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:3071: na me doṣo 'stīti cedbrūyāṃ tvaṃ punaridaṃ doṣābhāvavaco mṛṣetijñāsyāsi /
GK16ruyalscu:3072: ataḥ kiṃ vaktuṃ kṣamamiti na vedmi /
GK16ruyalscu:3078: athavā vyatikrāma kiṃ bhaṇama iti tu tasyaiva pratyāsannataratvādbhaṇatyanarhatā /
GK16ruyalscu:3080: atra virahavedanāvaśāt jyotsnāpikavacaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ tamaḥkrakacādirūpāpattyā yato durantatā /
GK16ruyalscu:3091: udīryamāṇasya idaṃ na ghaṭata iti niṣedhamukhenaiva /
GK16ruyalscu:3093: kiṃ bhaṇāma iti sāmānyadvāreṇa vaktumiṣṭasya jīvitasaṃśayādeḥ svarūpata eva bhaṇitiniṣedha ityarthavaśādāgūraṇam ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3094: sā nūnamityaṃ śoktau jīvituṃ na śaknomītyaṃśāntarasya svarūpato bhaṇitiniṣedhādāgūraṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:3099: nanu niṣedhākṣepaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vidhinā tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:3102: yata itthaṃ niṣedhena vidherākṣepaḥ atar idṛśi viṣaye nālaṅkāntaramityata āha-tataśceti /
GK16ruyalscu:3107: atra hyaparityājyatādi bālyāderna niṣedhakamapi tu tasya sādhakameveti nākṣepabuddhiḥ kāryā /
GK16ruyalscu:3110: tasmāt kāraṇāt saukaryeṇa viśeṣasiddhyarthaṃ tasya niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepokteḥ nimittaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:3112: ato yatra niṣedho vāstavo na tatrākṣepa iti sodāharaṇaṃ darśayati-iha tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3113: atra pūrva śloke daityā iva kāvyārthacorā luṇṭanāya yatpraguṇībhavanti,
GK16ruyalscu:3115: uttaraśloke tu sarve yathecchaṃ gṛhṇantu loke 'pi na kṣatiriti,
GK16ruyalscu:3117: tathā vāyoḥ kārāgṛhakḷptyai kandarāsu śilākavāṭadānaṃ vihitaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:3118: uttaraśloke evaṃ cintārūpaṃ dainyaṃ mṛṣā kirātā marutāsaha nirodhanavairaṃ necchrandīti kavāṭadānaṃ sākṣānniṣedhyata iti naitadyugalakayugamākṣepodāharaṇam
GK16ruyalscu:3122: gaṇikā dhanaparāyaṇāḥ satyaḥ sarvam asāmpratamācaranti yataḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3123: atastvayā viśvāso na kārya iti gaṇikāyā evoktau viśvāsaniṣedha ābhāsāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3136: anvayavyatikekāvasthāyino vastuno nyāyyo 'pi anvayavyatirekāvasthāyitayā samāna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3149: yato vidhirayaṃ ābhāsamāno niṣedhe vyajyamāna upakaraṇam ato vidhyābhāsena vyañjakenāyaṃ nirūpyamāṇo niṣedha ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3150: sa cāniṣṭaviśeṣe paryavasyan ākṣepālaṅkāra iti yojanā /
GK16ruyalscu:3159: jigamiṣāsti cet nāhaṃ nirākaromi iti gamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3160: gacchretyatra tu tena puraskṛto vidhirmamāpi tatraiva gatirbhūyāditi tu prāṇanairāśyāviṣkārān niṣedhapratyāyanam /
GK16ruyalscu:3170: gacchasicedityukto hi kiṃ tatra gamanena mama saṃvijñānetyādi pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3177: haṃso hi śithilāṃsaḥsan saviśeṣaṃ ramyo bhavati,
GK16ruyalscu:3181: anabhipretasyaiva sato gamanasya no kiñciktathanīyamastīti pramukha evābhyupagamaḥ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3182: itthaṃ ca sati vidhirayaṃ aniṣṭatvenābhāsamāno niṣedhāgūraṇātmana ākṣepasyāṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:3183: smartavyā ityanena bhūyastarānniṣedha evopodvilitaḥ tathāvidha vīcismṛtau gamanavārtāyā apyayogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:3203: atra janmani punaritthām anubhūtamanastvamiha na prākkoṭyapekṣaṃ pūrvamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3204: vivekasya viśeṣato dhvaṃsādupacitena mohāndhakāreṇa duruttaraḥ ko 'pi virahavikāro antarjaḍayati tāpayati ca /
GK16ruyalscu:3215: ataḥ śleṣagarbhatve śleṣo bādhakaḥ udbhaṭamatāvalambinām anyeṣāṃ tu saṅkaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3233: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇamantareṇa na saṃbhavatīti tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt tadabhāve 'pi yadi kāryasaṃbhavaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:3235: yadi kenaciduktivaicitryeṇa kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryasaṃbhava upanibaddhaḥ tadā vaiśiṣṭyena kāryabhāvanā dvibhāvanā /
GK16ruyalscu:3243: etadvavyatirekarūpayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇasya viśeṣoktyalaṅkārasyāpi virodhato bheda ityāha-evaṃ viśeṣoktavityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3252: ataḥ kriyā vyatirekiṇo 'pi kāraṇāsya saṃbhavāt sāmānyataḥ kāraṇagrahaṇameva kṛtam /
