GK16ruyalscu:3255: sā cātiśayoktirvibhāvanāṃ na vyabhicaratīti na bādhyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3271: anye tu saṃbharaṇāpuṣpayormaṇḍanāstre pratyāsavamadanyāyena sākṣādakarāṇatvādvāṅmātraṃ vibhāvanātvavacanam /
GK16ruyalscu:3274: apare tu vayasi maṇḍanatvādyāropāt rūpakameva yattva saṃbharaṇādi vaiśiṣṭyaṃ tadatraiva adhiropitamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3278: rūpakatve hi vayaso maṇḍanaṃ rūpopagrāhitāyā maṇḍanamevedamityādi prasajet /
GK16ruyalscu:3292: ataḥ kāraṇāni cet samagrāṇi tadā niyamena kāryotpattiriti sthitam /
GK16ruyalscu:3297: itthaṃ ca sati viśeṣamabhivyaṅgaktum uktiriti viśeṣoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3312: tatra hetuḥ anuktaścintitumaśakyaḥ triṣvapi yojayati-atra satyapi dāheti /
GK16ruyalscu:3313: svarūpeṇa śaktimāniti svaśabdena viruddhena dharmeṇa kvacidiyaṃ vibhāvanayā saṅkīryata iti darśayitumāha-kāryānupattirityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3317: yo me prathamaparibhogena kaumāraṃ hṛtavān adyāpi sa eva varaḥ vasantakṣapāḥ api tā eva /
GK16ruyalscu:3322: athāpi revānadīkūle tatra vetasītarutale suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau cetaḥsamuktaṇṭhate /
GK16ruyalscu:3333: atra ślokaḥ- kāryāṃśasya yadā bhāvābhāvau vaktumapekṣitau /

GK16ruyalscu:4348: cakārādabhūtabhāvitvādayaḥ śabdānākulatā ceti hetavo bhāmahānuśāsane udbhaṭalakṣaṇe
GK16ruyalscu:4353: atra uttare prakāre nanu vāstave 'pi saundarye laukikatayā mā bhūdvicchittiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4354: kaveḥ kakavinibandhasya vā vaktuḥ nibandhavaśādastyeva sakalavyavahartṛgocarībhātatā durapahnavāvicchittiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4355: tatra kuto na bhāvikamityata āha-yadi tu vāstavamapītyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:4356: yadi vastusanniveśyapi saundaryanibandhavaśāt savicchittikaṃ prāñca ācāryāḥ svabhāvoktivadalaṅkāratayā
GK16ruyalscu:4357: varṇayeyuḥ tadā ayamapi vāstavasaundaryaviṣayatayā samāśaṅkito bhāvikaprakāro nātīva
GK16ruyalscu:4360: sādhāraṇyena sacotanasaṃvādācca vicchittimatī varṇitā tathaiva vāstavasaundaryāvalambitayā
GK16ruyalscu:4362: tathā ca satibhūtabhāvitvādi sāmagrīsadbhāve 'nyakalpanāgauravādayamapi bhāvikaprakāra iti unmīlanaṃ yogyatayā suśakameva /
GK16ruyalscu:4363: unmīlitā ścollekhabhāvodayasandhiśabalatādaya atiprathana svātantrye 'pi cirantanasamayavyatikramaḥ syāditi /
GK16ruyalscu:4365: bhūtabhāvinaḥ pratyakṣā iva yatra kriyante ityetāvadeva bhāvikalakṣaṇamakāri yaiḥ khalu tairaśabdānākulatvādiva lakṣaṇatvenoktam /
GK16ruyalscu:4368: ato bhūtabhāvipratyakṣavadbhāvikalakṣaṇasya bhāvikasya śabdānākulatvavāstava saundaryāvalambenāpi bhāvikaprabhedo 'bhyanujñāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4373: satyapi sādṛśyaṃ kiñcinmātraṃ athāpi nyāyasañcārāyehāsmābhiḥ lakṣaṇamasya kṛtam /
GK16ruyalscu:4421: tathā vibhāvānubhāvaiḥ sūcitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ devatāviṣayā ratiśca bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4424: eṣāṃ caturṇāmupanibandhe paripāṭyā rasavān preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhitamiti alaṅkārā iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4430: ratihāsaśokādīnāṃ vāsanātmanāṃ sthāyibhāvānāṃ yāni loke kāryakāraṇasahakārīṇi tāni
GK16ruyalscu:4431: kāvye sandṛbdhāni nāṭye cābhinītāni guṇālaṅkāramahimnā caturvidhābhinayamahimnā ca
GK16ruyalscu:4433: taiḥ prakāśito vyañcito ratyādiḥ sāmājikacittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ śṛṅgārādiko rasa iti dik /
GK16ruyalscu:4439: vibhāvānubhāvābhyāṃ vyañjito vyabhicāri vākyārthībhāvadaśāyāṃ bhāva ucyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4442: tathā kāntāvyatirikte devatādiviṣaye vyañjito ratyādirapi bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4451: nanu rase 'pi praśamaḥ kiṃ nocyate ityata āha-tatrāpītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4452: rasasya hi akhaṇḍanirantarāyapratīti carvaṇīyasya paramaviśrāntirūpatvāt madhye prayāsya davasthā durlakṣyeti rasavyatiriktapariśiṣṭabhedaviṣayo 'yaṃ praśamo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4455: yatra hi vyañjanopaskṛte 'rbhidhādivyāpārātmani nibandhe raso 'sti tadrasavat /
GK16ruyalscu:4458: nanu nibandhane balaṃ nāma kimityata āha-anaucityeti /
GK16ruyalscu:4462: kasya? prakṛtatvāduktasya bhāvabhedasya yasya praśama ityapi paryāyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4463: nanu rasavadādinā dvitāyodāttasya ca kā kakṣyetyata āha-tatra yasminnityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4464: yatra hi bhāmahādidarśane vākyārthībhāvāt pradhānabhūtā eva rasādayo rasavadādyalaṅkārāḥ tatra aṅgabhūtarasādiviṣaya upapadyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4466: yasmiṃmastu rasavadādiralaṅkāro aṅgabhūtarasādiviṣaya eva aṅginastu rasāderalaṅkāryabhāvāpannasya
GK16ruyalscu:4472: bhūtāḥ tatra rasavadādayo 'laṅkārā ityalaṅkāramātrarasikānāṃ bhāmahādīnāṃ darśane /
GK16ruyalscu:4475: dhvanidarśane tu kāvyātmano rasādeḥ prādhānyadaśāyāṃ alaṅkāryatvādalaṅkārabhāvānupapattau aṅgabhūtā rasādayo rasavadādyalaṅkārāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4476: tathā ca sati rasabhāvādināyakamahāpuruṣacaritāvirbhāvo 'pi rasabhāvādyaṅgabhāvānatirekī vyaṅgyavyañjakamanbandhāt /
GK16ruyalscu:4481: kiṃ hāsyeneti-svapnadṛṣṭa nāyakaṃ svarūpasandarśananihnavaparihāsapravṛttaṃ manyamānasya ripustrījanasyoktivarṇanam /
GK16ruyalscu:4482: kiṃ hāsyena cirātprātpraḥsan punarme darśanaṃ na prayāsyasi?
GK16ruyalscu:4483: niṣkaruṇatā taveyaṃ prātpisamakālameva pravāsarucitā ityudīrayannevatamadṛṣṭvā “kenāsi dūrīkṛtaḥ“iti vadan vyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā riktabāhulayacastāraṃ roditīti /
GK16ruyalscu:4494: evaṃvidhe hi viṣaye vākyārthībhāvāt aṅginaṃ rasaṃ rasavantamanye pratipedire /
GK16ruyalscu:4496: dhvanidarśanavidastu aṅgino alaṅkāryatāṃ aṅgibhūtasya rasavadādirūpatāṃ dvitīyodāttāsaṃbhavaṃ ca siddhāntitavantaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4497: iyaṃ ca prakriyā rasāntareṣvapi jñeyetyāha-evaṃ rasāntareṣviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4502: preyo 'laṅkārādau tu viśeṣāṃśastu jñāta iti sādhāraṇyenodāhīrṣurāha-preyo 'laṅkārādāviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4506: harṣākhyo vyabhicāribhāvaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāraṃprati guṇātvāt preyo 'laṅkāra iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4507: vyabhicāribhāvaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāraṃprati guṇātvāt preyo 'laṅkāra iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4511: alaṅkārāntarabhramau mā bhūdeti paryāyamasyāha-eṣa eva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:4522: ato rasaṃ guṇīkṛtya nibandhanameva balāditi ūrjasvī /
GK16ruyalscu:4551: atrautsukyaṃ bhāvasyodayaḥ tasya ca guṇabhāva iha vivakṣaṇīyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4553: vāmena kareṇa priyatamāyā nayanāśrudhārāṃ dakṣiṇīna kṛpāṇādhārāṃ pramārjayan kartavyamūḍho 'bhūdityatthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4559: atra kkākāryaṃ kva ca śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kulamiti vitarkaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4580: ya ete anuprāsādayo bhāvaśabalatāntāḥ pṛthaguktāḥ teṣāṃ saṃbhavānusāreṇa yadi kutracit
GK16ruyalscu:4581: viṣaye sahabhāvaḥ tadaite kiṃ pṛthakpṛthagevālaṅkārāḥ utta sahabhāvavaicitryamalaṅkārāntarameveti
GK16ruyalscu:4583: sauvarṇa maṇimayānāṃ pṛthak cārutvahetutve 'pi saṃśleṣato yathā cārutvāntaraṃ tathānuprāsādīnāṃ apyalaṅkārāntarameva /
GK16ruyalscu:4586: yatobheda utkaṭo 'nutkaṭaśca ato dṛṣṭāntau samañjasāvityāha-ata evetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4589: saṅkaraḥ saprabhedaṃ jijñāsito 'pi saṃsṛṣṭyanantaraṃ vakṣyata ityāha-saṅkarastviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4592: atra pūrvārdhe bhakārāpekṣayā uttarārdhe ca lakārāpekṣayā vṛttyanuprāsaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4594: tathā lakalolakalo iti kalolakalola iti ca sajātīyayamakayorapi /
GK16ruyalscu:4606: pāda evāmbujamiti rūpakapakṣesa pratikūlaḥ ambakūlaḥ ambuje tadayogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:4623: evaṃ ca sati aṅgulībhiriveti yā vākyenoktā yā ca sarojalocanam iti samāsena tābhyāmupamābhyāṃ śleṣeṇa cānugṛhītā mukham iti atiśayo(ktiḥ)
GK16ruyalscu:4625: teṣāṃ balena samutthānādutthitā cotthāpakānāṃ camatkānāṃ camatkārakatvahetuḥ ityaṅgāṅgitā /
GK16ruyalscu:4630: atra vāruṇīti śleṣaḥ trayīmayo 'pyagamaditi virodhapratibhotthāpakaḥ tadvādhakaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:4636: tatra virodhaśleṣā vanupraviṣṭau yacca kāraṇotprekṣānimittaṃ pātādikāryaṃ tatra vāstavau pātāgripraveśāvupahatihetukapātāgripraveśābhyāmabhedena adhyavasitau /
GK16ruyalscu:4638: nanu virodhaśleṣayoratiśayoktyutprekṣayośca kuto nāṅgāṅgibhāva ittyāha-na ca virodhetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4639: yadyapi śleṣo viridhapratibhotpattihetuḥ yadyapi cātiśayoktiḥ utprekṣānimittaṃ tathāpi nānayoḥ śleṣābhyāṃ sahāṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4645: śleṣasya tu viviktau'styevetyata āha-na ca mantavyamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4647: ataḥ śleṣeṇa anyabādha iti tamnadhyānupraviṣṭo virodho 'pi bādhya eva /
GK16ruyalscu:4666: yathā hi śabdayormitho nopakāraḥ tathā śabdālaṅkārayorapi /
GK16ruyalscu:4667: kastarhir idṛśi viṣaye prakāra ityata āha-śabdālaṅkāreti /
GK16ruyalscu:4671: ataḥ śabdālaṅkāraparihāreṇa aṅgāṅgibhāva iti nirṇāyati-evameṣa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4687: mukhameva candra iti rūpakasamāsaśca sādhakabādhaka pramāṇavirahādanayoḥsandehaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4691: binduḥ śuddhādhvopādānamahāmāyā nādo 'nāhataḥ tau prasaratoyasmāt sisṛkṣostasmai /
GK16ruyalscu:4700: iha śaṅkara eva kṣīrasindhuriti rūpake sādhakam /
GK16ruyalscu:4702: amṛtaśabdo hi sudhāyāṃ pracuraprasiddhikaḥ kṣīrasindhāvanukūlatarara iti rūpakasamāsa evāyam /
GK16ruyalscu:4710: avantīścararūpāt pārijātāt jātāni yaśorūpāṇi prasūnāni digrūpāṇāṃ vadhūnāmavataṃsayāmi, paśyata /
GK16ruyalscu:4718: nanu śaradīveti samabhivyāhṛteyam upamā kathaṃ nopamāsādhiketyata āha- natu śaradīveti /
GK16ruyalscu:4719: nyāyato vākyārthībhūtaṃ rūpakamābhāsata ekadeśavirtinyupamā na hi bādhiturm iṣṭe /
GK16ruyalscu:4727: prakāntenaikenaiva nirvahaṇīyamiti naiṣā rājājñā yena dṛṣṭabādha āśaṅkyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4728: yallaṅghanenadṛṣṭabādṛṣṭayordvayorapi bādhaḥsyāt yato nyāyo 'yamityatata āha-nāpyeṣa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4731: iha tu uttarottaraṃ prakarṣavivakṣeti upamāpekṣayā rūpake sāmyaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4736: hāraḥ kuṭhārāyata iti tūpamayā prakarṣa nītaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4738: sāmānyaprayoge upamābādhaka iti nyāyopanno rūpakaprakrama eva nirvahīṇīya iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:4742: itthamaṅgāṅgibhāvasandeha rūpaṃ prakāradvayaṃ vivicya tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ vivecayati-tṛtīyastviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4750: ekatraiva narakaśabde 'nupraviṣṭau śliṣṭaśabdenobhayopakārāt śabdaśleṣeṇāpyupamā saṅkarārthamāha-atra ca yathetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4758: ataḥ sāmagrīyogāt sampannā dyotitaraṅgaśobhinītyekasminneva śabde sabhaṅgapadatvāt śabdaśleṣeṇa saṃkīrṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:4765: udbhāṭaprakāśitastu prakārāntaragocaraśabdārthālaṅkārasaṃkaraḥ saṃsṛṣṭau antarbhāvita iti tasya saṃkaratvamaṅgāṅgibhāva evoktamityāha-śabdārthālaṅkāretyādi
GK16ruyalscu:4786: stutyā nindāyāḥ nindāyā vā stutergamyatve vyājastutiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4813: nanu śabdādyalaṅkāratve ko doṣa ityata āha-tadalaṅkāratvaprayojakatva iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4819: itthaṃ bhūmrā rucakavacasāṃ vistaraḥ karkaśo 'yaṃ ṭīkāsmābhiḥ samuparacitānena sañjīvanīyam //
